<EFX_CONTROL_AND_PROCEDURES>
<A NAME="FIS_CONTROL_AND_PROCEDURES"></A>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<A NAME="D309462D10K_HTM_TX309462_12">
</A>
	Item&nbsp;9A.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Controls and Procedures
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<I>
	Disclosure
	Controls and Procedures
</I>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Company maintains a system of disclosure controls and procedures that is
	designed to provide reasonable assurance that information, which is required to be disclosed, is accumulated and communicated to management in a timely manner. Under the supervision and with the participation of our management, including the
	Company&#146;s principal executive officer and principal financial officer, we have evaluated the effectiveness of our system of disclosure controls and procedures as required by Exchange Act
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Rule&nbsp;13a-15(b)
</FONT>
	as of December&nbsp;31, 2016. Based on that evaluation, the Company&#146;s principal executive officer and principal financial officer concluded that the Company&#146;s disclosure controls
	and procedures are effective at the reasonable assurance level.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Such evaluation did not identify any change
	in the Company&#146;s internal control over financial reporting during the quarter ended December&nbsp;31, 2016 that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the Company&#146;s internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<I>
	Internal Control over Financial Reporting
</I>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Management&#146;s report on the Company&#146;s internal controls over financial reporting is included in Part&nbsp;II, Item&nbsp;8 of this Annual Report on
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Form&nbsp;10-K.
</FONT>
	The report of the independent registered public accounting firm with respect to the effectiveness of internal control over financial reporting is included in Part&nbsp;II, Item&nbsp;8 of this
	Annual Report on
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Form&nbsp;10-K.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
</EFX_CONTROL_AND_PROCEDURES>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<B>
<A NAME="D309462D10K_HTM_TX309462_20">
</A>
	SIGNATURES
</B>
</FONT>
</P>

<DIV CLASS="eolNewPage"></DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage102"></A>
<A NAME="D309462DEX31_HTM"></A>
<EFX_EXHIBIT_3>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_3"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<B>
	Exhibit 3.1
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	CONFORMED COPY OF
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	AMENDED AND RESTATED
</B>
</P>
<EFX_CERTIFICATE_OF_INCORPORATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATE_OF_INCORPORATION"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	CERTIFICATE OF INCORPORATION
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	OF
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	AMETEK, INC.
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	AS AMENDED TO DATE
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	[Conformed
	copy giving effect to all amendments since the date of the filing of the Amended and Restated Certificate of Incorporation on April&nbsp;24, 2007.]
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:5%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	FIRST.&nbsp;&nbsp;The name of the corporation is AMETEK, INC. (the &#147;Company&#148;).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:5%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	SECOND.&nbsp;&nbsp;The address of the Company&#146;s registered office in the State of Delaware is 2711 Centerville Road, Suite 400, City of
	Wilmington, County of New Castle, Delaware 19808. The name of the Company&#146;s registered agent at such address is Corporation Service Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:5%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	THIRD.&nbsp;&nbsp;The purpose of the Company is to engage in any lawful act or activity for which corporations may be organized under the
	General Corporation Law of the State of Delaware (&#147;DGCL&#148;).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:5%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	FOURTH. Section&nbsp;1.&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	Authorized Capital
	Stock
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company is authorized to issue two classes of capital stock, designated Common Stock and Preferred Stock. The total number of shares of capital stock that the Company is authorized to issue is 805,000,000 shares, consisting
	of 800,000,000 shares of Common Stock, par value $0.01 per share, and 5,000,000 shares of Preferred Stock, par value $0.01 per share.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:5%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section&nbsp;2.&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	Preferred Stock
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Preferred Stock may be issued in one or more series. The Board of Directors
	of the Company (the &#147;Board&#148;) is hereby authorized to issue the shares of Preferred Stock in such series and to fix from time to time before issuance the number of shares to be included in any such series and the designation, relative
	powers, preferences, rights, qualifications, limitations and restrictions of all shares of such series. The authority of the Board with respect to each such series will include, without limiting the generality of the foregoing, the determination of
	any or all of the following:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; TEXT-INDENT:2%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;the number of shares of any series and the designation to distinguish the
	shares of such series from the shares of all other series;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; TEXT-INDENT:2%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;the voting powers, if any, and whether such
	voting powers are full or limited in such series;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; TEXT-INDENT:2%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;the redemption provisions, if any, applicable to such
	series, including the redemption price or prices to be paid;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage103"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; TEXT-INDENT:2%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;whether dividends, if any, will be cumulative or noncumulative,
	the dividend rate of such series, and the dates and preferences of dividends on such series;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; TEXT-INDENT:2%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(e)&nbsp;&nbsp;the rights of
	such series upon the voluntary or involuntary dissolution of, or upon any distribution of the assets of, the Company;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; TEXT-INDENT:2%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(f)&nbsp;&nbsp;the provisions, if any, pursuant to which the shares of such series are convertible into, or exchangeable for,
	shares of any other class or classes or of any other series of the same or any other class or classes of stock, or any other security, of the Company or any other corporation or other entity, and the price or prices or the rates of exchange
	applicable thereto;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; TEXT-INDENT:2%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(g)&nbsp;&nbsp;the right, if any, to subscribe for or to purchase any securities of the Company or
	any other corporation or other entity;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; TEXT-INDENT:2%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(h)&nbsp;&nbsp;the provisions, if any, of a sinking fund applicable to such
	series; and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; TEXT-INDENT:2%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;any other relative, participating, optional, or other special powers, preferences, rights,
	qualifications, limitations, or restrictions thereof;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	all as may be determined from time to time by the Board and stated in the resolution or resolutions
	providing for the issuance of such Preferred Stock (collectively, a &#147;Preferred Stock Designation&#148;).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:5%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section&nbsp;3.&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	Common Stock
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Except as may otherwise be provided in a Preferred Stock Designation, the holders
	of Common Stock will be entitled to one vote on each matter submitted to a vote at a meeting of stockholders for each share of Common Stock held of record by such holder as of the record date for such meeting.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:5%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	FIFTH.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Board may make, amend, and repeal the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	By-Laws
</FONT>
	of the Company. Any
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	By-Law
</FONT>
	made by the Board under the powers conferred hereby may be amended or repealed by the Board or by the stockholders in the manner provided in the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	By-Laws
</FONT>
	of the Company.
	Notwithstanding the foregoing and anything contained in this Amended and Restated Certificate of Incorporation to the contrary,
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	By-Laws
</FONT>
	3, 8, 10, 11, 12, 13 and 39 may not be amended or repealed by the
	stockholders, and no provision inconsistent therewith may be adopted by the stockholders, without the affirmative vote of the holders of at least 80% of the Voting Stock, voting together as a single class. The Company may in its
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	By-Laws
</FONT>
	confer powers upon the Board in addition to the foregoing and in addition to the powers and authorities expressly conferred upon the Board by applicable law. For the purposes of this Amended and Restated
	Certificate of Incorporation, &#147;Voting Stock&#148; means stock of the Company of any class or series entitled to vote generally in the election of Directors. Notwithstanding anything contained in this Amended and Restated Certificate of
	Incorporation to the contrary, the affirmative vote of the holders of at least 80% of the Voting Stock, voting together as a single class, is required to amend or repeal, or to adopt any provisions inconsistent with, this Article Fifth.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	2
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage104"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:5%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	SIXTH.&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to the rights of the holders of any series of Preferred Stock:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; TEXT-INDENT:2%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;any action required or permitted to be taken by the stockholders of the Company must be effected at a duly
	called annual or special meeting of stockholders of the Company and may not be effected by any consent in writing of such stockholders; and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; TEXT-INDENT:2%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;special meetings of stockholders of the Company may be called only by (i)&nbsp;the Chairman of the Board (the
	&#147;Chairman&#148;), (ii) the Corporate Secretary of the Company (the &#147;Secretary&#148;) within 10 calendar days after receipt of the written request of a majority of the total number of Directors which the Company would have if there were no
	vacancies (the &#147;Whole Board&#148;), or (iii)&nbsp;the Secretary upon the written request made in accordance with and subject to the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	By-Laws
</FONT>
	of holders of record, who hold a &#147;net long position&#148;
	(as defined in the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	By-Laws),
</FONT>
	of not less than fifty percent (50%) of the then outstanding shares of the Voting Stock of the Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	At any annual meeting or special meeting of stockholders of the Company, only such business will be conducted or considered as has been brought before such
	meeting in the manner provided in the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	By-Laws
</FONT>
	of the Company. Notwithstanding anything contained in this Amended and Restated Certificate of Incorporation to the contrary, the affirmative vote of at least 80%
	of the Voting Stock, voting together as a single class, will be required to amend or repeal, or adopt any provision inconsistent with, this Article Sixth.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:5%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	SEVENTH.&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;1.&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	Number, Election, and Terms of Directors
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to the rights, if any, of
	the holders of any series of Preferred Stock to elect additional Directors under circumstances specified in a Preferred Stock Designation, the number of the Directors of the Company will not be less than three nor more than 12 and will be fixed from
	time to time in the manner described in the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	By-Laws
</FONT>
	of the Company. The Directors, other than those who may be elected by the holders of any series of Preferred Stock, will be classified with respect to the
	time for which they severally hold office into three classes, as nearly equal in number as possible, designated Class&nbsp;I, Class&nbsp;II, and Class&nbsp;III. The Directors first appointed to Class&nbsp;I will hold office for a term expiring at
	the first annual meeting of stockholders to be held following the filing of this Certificate; the Directors first appointed to Class&nbsp;II will hold office for a term expiring at the second annual meeting of stockholders to be held following the
	filing of this Certificate; and the Directors first appointed to Class&nbsp;III will hold office for a term expiring at the third annual meeting of stockholders to be held following the filing of this Certificate, with the members of each class to
	hold office until their successors are elected and qualified. At each succeeding annual meeting of the Company, the successors of the class of Directors whose terms expire at that meeting will be elected by plurality vote of all votes cast at such
	meeting to hold office for a term expiring at the annual meeting of stockholders held in the third year following the year of their election. Election of Directors of the Company need not be by written ballot unless requested by the Chairman or by
	the holders of a majority of the Voting Stock present in person or represented by proxy at a meeting of the stockholders at which Directors are to be elected.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:5%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section&nbsp;2.&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	Nomination of Director Candidates
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Advance notice of stockholder nominations for the election of
	Directors must be given in the manner provided in the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	By-Laws
</FONT>
	of the Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	3
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage105"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:5%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section 3.&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	Newly Created Directorships and Vacancies
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to the
	rights, if any, of the holders of any series of Preferred Stock to elect additional Directors under circumstances specified in a Preferred Stock Designation, newly created directorships resulting from any increase in the number of Directors and any
	vacancies in the Board resulting from death, resignation, disqualification, removal, or other cause will be filled solely by the affirmative vote of a majority of the remaining Directors then in office, even though less than a quorum of the Board,
	or by a sole remaining Director. Any Director elected in accordance with the preceding sentence will hold office for the remainder of the full term of the class of Directors in which the new directorship was created or the vacancy occurred and until
	such Director&#146;s successor has been elected and qualified. No decrease in the number of Directors constituting the Board may shorten the term of any incumbent Director.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:5%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section&nbsp;4.&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	Removal
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to the rights, if any, of the holders of any series of Preferred Stock to elect
	additional Directors under circumstances specified in a Preferred Stock Designation, any Director may be removed from office by the stockholders only for cause and only in the manner provided in this Section&nbsp;4. At any annual meeting or special
	meeting of the stockholders, the notice of which states that the removal of a Director or Directors is among the purposes of the meeting, the affirmative vote of the holders of at least a majority of the Voting Stock, voting together as a single
	class, may remove such Director or Directors for cause. Except as may be provided by applicable law, cause for removal will be deemed to exist only if the Director whose removal is proposed has been adjudged by a court of competent jurisdiction to
	be liable to the Company or its stockholders for misconduct as a result of (a)&nbsp;a breach of such Director&#146;s duty of loyalty to the Company, (b)&nbsp;any act or omission by such Director not in good faith or which involves a knowing
	violation of law, or (c)&nbsp;any transaction from which such Director derived an improper personal benefit, and such adjudication is no longer subject to direct appeal.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:5%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section&nbsp;5.&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	Amendment, Repeal, Etc
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding anything contained in this Amended and Restated
	Certificate of Incorporation to the contrary, the affirmative vote of at least 80% of the Voting Stock, voting together as a single class, is required to amend or repeal, or adopt any provision inconsistent with, this Article Seventh.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:5%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	EIGHTH.&nbsp;&nbsp;To the fullest extent permitted by the Delaware General Corporation Law, a director of the Company shall not be liable to
	the Company or its stockholders for monetary damages for any breach of a fiduciary duty as a director. If the Delaware General Corporation Law is hereafter amended to authorize the further elimination or limitation of the liability of a director,
	then the liability of a director of the Company shall be eliminated or limited to the fullest extent permitted by the Delaware Corporation law, as so amended. Any repeal or modification of the foregoing provisions of this Article EIGHTH by the
	stockholders of the Company shall not adversely affect any right or protection of a director of the Company existing at the time of such repeal or modification.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:5%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	NINTH.&nbsp;&nbsp;Each person who is or was or had agreed to become a Director or officer of the Company, and each such person who is or was
	serving or who had agreed to serve at the request of the Board or an officer of the Company as an employee or agent of the Company or as a director, officer, employee, or agent of another corporation, partnership, joint venture, trust, or other
	entity, whether for profit or not for profit (including the heirs, executors, administrators, or estate of such person), will be indemnified by the Company to the fullest extent permitted by the Delaware General Corporation Law as the same may be
	amended or supplemented. The right of
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	4
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage106"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	indemnification provided in this Article Ninth (a)&nbsp;will not be exclusive of any other rights to which any person seeking indemnification may otherwise be entitled, including without
	limitation pursuant to any contract approved by a majority of the Whole Board (whether or not the Directors approving such contract are or are to be parties to such contract or similar contracts), and (b)&nbsp;will be applicable to matters otherwise
	within its scope whether or not such matters arose or arise before or after the adoption of this Article Ninth. Without limiting the generality or the effect of the foregoing, the Company may adopt
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	By-Laws,
</FONT>
	or
	enter into one or more agreements with any person, which provide for indemnification greater or different than that provided in this Article Ninth or the Delaware General Corporation Law. Notwithstanding anything contained in this Amended and
	Restated Certificate of Incorporation to the contrary, the amendment or repeal of, or adoption of any provision inconsistent with, this Article Ninth will require the affirmative vote of the holders of at least 80% of the Voting Stock, voting
	together as a single class. Any amendment or repeal of, or adoption of any provision inconsistent with, this Article Tenth will not adversely affect any right or protection existing hereunder prior to such amendment, repeal, or adoption.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:5%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	TENTH.&nbsp;&nbsp;Whenever a compromise or arrangement is proposed between the Company and its creditors or any class of them and/or between
	the Company and its stockholders or any class of them, any court of equitable jurisdiction within the State of Delaware may, on the application in a summary way of the Company or any creditor or stockholder thereof or on the application of any
	receiver or receivers appointed for the Company under the provisions of Section&nbsp;291 of Title 8 of the Delaware Code or on the application of trustees in dissolution or of any receiver or receivers appointed for the Company under the provisions
	of Section&nbsp;279 of Title 8 of the Delaware Code, order a meeting of the creditors or class of creditors, and/or of the stockholders or class of stockholders, of the Company, as the case may be, to be summoned in such manner as the said court
	directs. If a majority in number representing three-fourths in value of the creditors or class of creditors, and/or of the stockholders or class of stockholders, of the Company, as the case may be, agree to any compromise or arrangement and to any
	reorganization of the Company as a consequence of such compromise or arrangement, the said compromise or arrangement and the said reorganization shall, if sanctioned by the court to which the said application has been made, be binding on all the
	creditors or class of creditors, and/or on all the stockholders or class of stockholders, of the Company, as the case may be, and also on the Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT:7%; TEXT-INDENT:5%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the undersigned has executed and acknowledged this Conformed Copy of the Certificate of Incorporation of
	AMETEK, Inc. this 29
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	day of November, 2016.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<TD NOWRAP VALIGN="BOTTOM">

</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" COLSPAN="5">
<P STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:1.00EM; TEXT-INDENT:-1.00EM; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<B>
	APPENDIX A
</B>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<B>
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	A-1
</FONT>
</B>
</TD>
<TD NOWRAP VALIGN="BOTTOM">
<B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">

	&nbsp;&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc., Deferred Compensation Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage110"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 1.&nbsp;&nbsp;PURPOSE
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:20PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	1.01.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Purpose.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The AMETEK, Inc. Deferred Compensation Plan (the &#147;Plan&#148;), is intended to
	provide additional retirement benefits and increased financial security, on a
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	tax-favored
</FONT>
	basis, to a select group of management and highly compensated employees of AMETEK, Inc. These individuals may defer a
	portion of their annual incentive bonus under the Plan if their compensation (as defined under the Plan) exceeds the compensation limits of section 401(a)(17) of the Code.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	1.02.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Effective Date
</B>
	.
<B>
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The Plan, as hereby amended and restated, is effective with respect to
	amounts that were not deferred or vested (within the meaning of section 409A of the Code) before January&nbsp;1, 2005, and any earnings on such amounts. Amounts deferred and vested (within the meaning of section 409A of the Code) before
	January&nbsp;1, 2005 and earnings on such amounts are not affected by this amendment and restatement of the Plan, and remain subject to the terms of the October&nbsp;1, 1999 plan document, which are set forth in Appendix A to this January&nbsp;1,
	2017, amendment and restatement. For recordkeeping purposes, the Company will establish separate accounts for each Participant for amounts deferred and vested before January&nbsp;1, 2005, and amounts deferred and vested on or after that date.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc., Deferred Compensation Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 1&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage111"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 2.&nbsp;&nbsp;DEFINITIONS AND CONSTRUCTION
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:20PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	2.01.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Definitions.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	For the purpose of this Plan, the following terms shall have the meanings set forth
	below, unless the context clearly indicates otherwise.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(a)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Account
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Account&#148; or &#147;Accounts&#148; means the hypothetical Retirement Distribution Account and/or
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution
	Account established on the books of the Company pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.01.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(b)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Article
</U>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Article&#148; means an article of this Plan.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(c)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Beneficiary
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Beneficiary&#148; means the person, persons or entity as designated by the Participant, entitled under Article 7 to receive any Plan benefits payable after the
	Participant&#146;s death.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(d)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Board
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Board&#148; means the Board of Directors of AMETEK, Inc.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(e)
</B>
<B>
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Bonus Compensation
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Bonus Compensation&#148; means the portion of an Eligible Employee&#146;s Compensation consisting of the amount of the incentive to be paid to an Eligible
	Employee under the Company&#146;s incentive compensation plan for a Plan Year, other than any bonus paid to an Eligible Employee that is characterized by the Company as a &#147;sign on bonus&#148; or other
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	non-recurring
</FONT>
	incentive bonus.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(f)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Bonus Compensation Deferral
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Bonus Compensation Deferral&#148; means that portion of Eligible Bonus Compensation as to which an Eligible Employee has made an annual
	irrevocable election to defer receipt until the date specified under the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Option and/or the Retirement Distribution Option.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(g)
</B>
<B>
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Change in Control
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;A &#147;Change in Control&#148; shall occur if:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Any one Person or more than one Person acting as a group (as defined in section
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	1.409A-3(i)(5)(v)(B)
</FONT>
	of the Treasury Regulations) acquires ownership of stock of the Company that,
	together with the stock held by such Person or group of Persons, constitutes more than 50&nbsp;percent of the total fair market value or total voting power of the stock of the Company. However, if such Person or group of Persons is considered to own
	more than 50&nbsp;percent of the total fair market value or total voting power of the stock of the Company before this transfer of the Company&#146;s stock, the acquisition of additional stock by the same Person or group of Persons shall not be
	considered to cause a Change in Control of the Company; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT">
	Any one Person or more than one Person acting as a group (as defined in section
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	1.409A-3(i)(5)(v)(B)
</FONT>
	of the Treasury Regulations) acquires (or has acquired during the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	12-month
</FONT>
	period ending on the date of the most recent acquisition by such Person
	or group of Persons) ownership of stock of the Company possessing 30&nbsp;percent or more of the total voting power of the stock of the Company. However, if such Person or group of Persons is considered to own 30&nbsp;percent or more of the total
	voting power of the stock of the Company before this acquisition, the acquisition of additional control
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc., Deferred Compensation Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 2&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage112"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="21%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	or stock of the Company by the same Person or group of Persons shall not cause a Change in Control of the Company; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(3)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	A majority of members of the Company&#146;s Board is replaced during any
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	12-month
</FONT>
	period by directors whose appointment or election is not endorsed by a majority of the members of
	the Company&#146;s Board before the date of the appointment or election; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(4)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Any one Person or more than one Person acting as a group (as defined in section
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	1.409A-3(i)(5)(v)(B)
</FONT>
	of the Treasury Regulations) acquires (or has acquired during the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	12-month
</FONT>
	period ending on the date of the most recent acquisition by such Person or group of Persons) assets from the Company that have a total gross fair market value equal to substantially all but in no event less
	than 40&nbsp;percent of the total fair market value of all assets of the Company immediately prior to such acquisition or acquisitions. For this purpose, gross fair market value means the value of the assets of the Company, or the value of the
	assets being disposed of, determined without regard to any liabilities associated with such assets. A transfer of assets by the Company will not result in a Change in Control under this Section 2.01(g)(4), if the assets are transferred to:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="21%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(A)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	A shareholder of the Company (immediately before the asset transfer) in exchange for or with respect to its stock;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="21%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(B)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	An entity, 50&nbsp;percent or more of the total value or voting power of which is owned, directly or indirectly, by the Company immediately after the transfer of assets;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="21%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(C)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	A Person or more than one Person acting as a group (as defined in
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	section&nbsp;1.409A-3(i)(5)(v)(B)
</FONT>
	of the Treasury Regulations) that owns, directly or indirectly, 50&nbsp;percent
	or more of the total value or voting power of all the outstanding stock of the Company; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="21%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(D)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	An entity, at least 50&nbsp;percent of the total value or voting power of which is owned directly or indirectly, by a person described in Section 2.01(g)(4)(C), above.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:14%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	For purposes of this Section 2.01(g), no acquisition, either directly or indirectly, by the Participant, his affiliates and associates, the Company,
	any subsidiary of the Company, any employee benefit plan of the Company or of any subsidiary of the Company, or any person or entity organized, appointed or established by the Company for or pursuant to the terms of any such employee benefit plan
	shall constitute a Change in Control.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:14%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	For purposes of this Section 2.01(g), the following terms shall have the meanings set forth below:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	&#147;Company&#148; shall mean AMETEK, Inc., except that, if a Participant is employed by a majority-controlled subsidiary of the Company, for purposes of Sections 2.01(g)(1), 2.01(g)(2), and 2.01(g)(4),
	&#147;Company&#148; shall mean such subsidiary.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">

	&nbsp;&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc., Deferred Compensation Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 3&nbsp;&nbsp;

</TR>

<A NAME="eolPage113"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	&#147;Person&#148; shall mean any individual or individuals other than the Participant, his affiliates and associates, the Company, any subsidiary of the Company, any employee benefit plan of the Company or of any
	subsidiary of the Company, or any person or entity organized, appointed or established by the Company for or pursuant to the terms of any such employee benefit plan.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(h)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Code
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Code&#148; means the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(i)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Committee
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Committee&#148; means the Committee appointed by the Board (or its delegee) to administer the Plan pursuant to Article 8.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(j)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Company
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Company&#148; means AMETEK, Inc., a Delaware corporation, and any directly or indirectly affiliated subsidiary corporations, any other affiliate designated by the
	Board, or any successor to the business thereof.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(k)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Compensation
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Compensation&#148; means &#147;compensation&#148; as such term is defined in Treas. Reg. &#167;
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	1.415(c)-2(d)(4)
</FONT>
	without
	regard to the limitations of Code &#167; 415, excluding reimbursements or other expense allowances, fringe benefits, moving expenses, deferred compensation, welfare benefits,
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	sign-on
</FONT>
	bonuses, imputed income
	with respect to split dollar life insurance, severance benefits (paid in any form), and amounts described in Treas. Reg. &#167;
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	1.415(c)-1(c)
</FONT>
	but including (1) (a) amounts contributed by a Participant to a
	Plan that is &#147;qualified&#148; under Section 401(a) of the Code and (b)&nbsp;amounts otherwise excludible from the Participant&#146;s gross income under Section&nbsp;125 of the Code and Section 132(f)(4) of the Code and (2)&nbsp;
<U>
	not
</U>
	including Bonus Compensation paid during that year but earned in the preceding year.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(l)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Disability
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Disability&#148; means a medically determinable physical or mental impairment which can be expected to result in death or can be expected to last for a continuous
	period of not less than twelve (12)&nbsp;months that (1)&nbsp;renders a Participant unable to engage in any substantial gainful activity or (2)&nbsp;results in a Participant receiving income replacement benefits for a period of not less than three
	(3)&nbsp;months under an accident and health plan covering employees of the Company. The Committee shall determine the existence of Disability, in its sole discretion, and may rely on advice from a medical examiner satisfactory to the Committee in
	making the determination. A Participant will also be considered disabled if he has been determined to be totally disabled by the Social Security Administration. The term &#147;Disability&#148; is intended to comply with section 409A(a)(2)(C) of the
	Code and shall be interpreted to permit a Participant to take a distribution in any circumstance that would be permitted under section 409A(a)(2)(C) of the Code.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(m)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Distribution Option
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Distribution Option&#148; means the two distribution options that are available under the Plan: the Retirement Distribution Option and the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Option.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(n)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Eligible Bonus Compensation
</U>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Eligible Bonus Compensation&#148; is the amount calculated under the following formula:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc., Deferred Compensation Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 4&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage114"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	&#147;Total Plan Year Compensation&#148; is an Eligible Employee&#146;s Bonus Compensation that is earned (not paid) during a Plan Year
<B>
<I>
	plus
</I>
</B>
	the Eligible Employee&#146;s Compensation for that same year.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	If the Eligible Employee&#146;s Total Plan Year Compensation is less than or equal to the compensation limit in effect under section 401(a)(17) of the Code for the Plan Year, then the Eligible Employee&#146;s Eligible
	Bonus Compensation for that year shall be $0.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(3)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	If the Eligible Employee&#146;s Total Plan Year Compensation is greater than the compensation limit in effect under section 401(a)(17) for the Plan Year, then the Eligible Employee&#146;s Eligible Bonus Compensation for
	that year shall be the lesser of (A)&nbsp;the Eligible Employee&#146;s Bonus Compensation or (B)&nbsp;the amount by which the Eligible Employee&#146;s Total Plan Year Compensation exceeds the compensation limit in effect under section 401(a)(17) of
	the Code for that year.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(o)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Eligible Employee
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Eligible Employee&#148; means an employee of the Company who is designated by the Committee, in its sole discretion, to be eligible to participate in the
	Plan pursuant to Section&nbsp;3.01.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(p)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Investment Funds
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Investment Funds&#148; means the separate deemed investment funds identified on Exhibit A of the Plan that a Participant may direct be used as a method to
	measure the growth of the Participant&#146;s Bonus Compensation Deferrals, if any, while credited to the Participant&#146;s Accounts.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Account
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Account&#148; means the Account
	maintained for a Participant to which Bonus Compensation Deferrals are credited pursuant to the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Option.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</FONT>
	Distribution Option&#148; means the Distribution
	Option pursuant to which benefits are payable in accordance with Section&nbsp;6.02.

	Participant
</U>
</B>

</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Participant&#148; means any employee who is eligible and has become a participant pursuant to Section&nbsp;3.01. Such employee shall remain a Participant in this
	Plan until such time as all benefits payable under this Plan have been paid in accordance with the provisions hereof.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Plan Year&#148; means the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	12-month
</FONT>
	period beginning on each January&nbsp;1 and ending on the following December 31.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	Retirement
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Retirement&#148; or &#147;Retires&#148; means a Participant&#146;s Separation from Service with the Company (for reasons other than death) at or after attaining
	age 55 and completing 10 or more Years of Service.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Retirement Distribution Option&#148; means the Distribution Option pursuant to which benefits are payable in accordance with
	Section&nbsp;6.01.

	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(y)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Section
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Section&#148; means a section of this Plan.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(z)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Separation from Service
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Separates from Service&#148; or &#147;Separation from Service&#148; means separation from service within the meaning of section 409A of the Code.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(aa)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Voting Securities
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Voting Securities&#148; means the common securities of AMETEK, Inc. that carry the right to vote generally in the election of directors.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(bb)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Year of Service
</U>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Year of Service&#148; means the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	12-month
</FONT>
	period following the date that the Participant first performs an hour of service for the
	Company and each consecutive
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	12-month
</FONT>
	period following the anniversary of that date that is completed before the Participant Separates from Service.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	2.02.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Construction.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	For purposes of the Plan, unless the contrary is clearly indicated by the context,
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(a)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	the use of the masculine gender shall also include within its meaning the feminine and vice versa,
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(b)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	the use of the singular shall also include within its meaning the plural and vice versa, and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<B>
	(c)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	the word &#147;include&#148; shall mean to include without limitation.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">

</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">

</TD>
