<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc., Deferred Compensation Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 6&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage116"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 3.&nbsp;&nbsp;ELIGIBILITY AND PARTICIPATION
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	3.01.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Eligibility and Participation.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Eligibility to participate in the Plan shall be limited to that
	select group of management and/or highly compensated employees of the Company whom the Committee designates as eligible to participate in the Plan. An Eligible Employee shall become a Participant in the Plan when he first makes a Bonus Compensation
	Deferral election pursuant to Article 4.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	3.02.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Change in Employment Status.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	If the Committee determines that a Participant&#146;s position is
	no longer at a level that warrants reward through participation in this Plan, but does not terminate the Participant&#146;s employment with the Company, (1)&nbsp;the Participant shall not be permitted to make a Bonus Compensation Deferral election
	for the Plan Year specified by the Committee and each Plan Year thereafter until the Committee determines that the Participant has again become employed in a position that warrants full participation in the Plan; and (2)&nbsp;the Participant&#146;s
	benefits under this Plan shall be limited to the balance in the Participant&#146;s Accounts as of the date so specified by the Committee, which shall be adjusted each subsequent year that the Participant remains an active employee of the Company
	(and does not again become employed in a position that warrants full participation in the Plan) by the deemed earnings on the Investment Funds elected by the Participant.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	If the Committee, in its sole discretion, determines that the Participant no longer qualifies as a member of a select group of management or highly
	compensated employees, as determined in accordance with ERISA, the Committee may, in its sole discretion, take any action permitted under section 409A of the Code as it deems necessary to preserve the status of the Plan as a &#147;top hat&#148; plan
	under ERISA.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc., Deferred Compensation Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 7&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage117"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 4.&nbsp;&nbsp;ELECTION REQUIREMENTS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	4.01.
</B>
<B>
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	Bonus Compensation Deferral Election Filing Deadline.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(a)
</B>
<B>
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	Except as provided in Sections 4.02 and 4.03, below, an election to defer an amount equal to all or part of an Eligible Employee&#146;s Bonus Compensation shall be filed with the Committee at least six months
	before the end of the Plan Year in which the Bonus Compensation is earned (i.e. by June 30th); provided that, if the Bonus Compensation is not &#147;performance-based compensation&#148; within the meaning of section 409A of the Code, the Bonus
	Compensation Deferral election shall be filed with the Committee no later than the last day of the Plan Year preceding the Plan Year in which the Bonus Compensation is earned. The election, once filed, shall be irrevocable and shall remain in effect
	until the end of the Plan Year to which it pertains.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(b)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	An election made pursuant to Section 4.01(a) shall be in writing, in a form acceptable to the Committee, and shall specify such information as required by the Committee. The Committee may establish minimum or
	maximum amounts that may be deferred under this Section&nbsp;4.01 and may change such standards from time to time. Any such limits shall be communicated by the Committee to the Participants before the commencement of a Plan Year.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	4.02.
</B>
<B>
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	New Eligible Employees.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The Committee may, in its discretion, permit an employees who first
	becomes an Eligible Employee after the beginning of a Plan Year to make a Bonus Compensation Deferral for that Plan Year by filing a completed and fully executed deferral election form, in accordance with Section 4.01(a), within thirty
	(30)&nbsp;days following the date the employee becomes an Eligible Employee, unless he was previously eligible to participant in another account-based deferred compensation arrangement of the Company. If the Eligible Employee was previously eligible
	to participate in another account-based deferred compensation arrangement of the Company, the Eligible Employee shall not be permitted to make a Bonus Compensation Deferral under this Section&nbsp;4.02 or Section&nbsp;4.01 for the Plan Year in which
	he is hired but shall be permitted to make a Bonus Compensation Deferral pursuant to Section&nbsp;4.01 for the Plan Year after the Plan Year in which he is hired and each subsequent Plan Year. Any Bonus Compensation Deferral made under this
	Section&nbsp;4.02 shall apply only to Bonus Compensation and Compensation earned for services performed after the election is made.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	4.03.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	2005 Plan Year
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Re-Deferral
</FONT>
	Election.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	For the 2005 Plan Year, an
	Eligible Employee may file the requisite deferral election form by March&nbsp;15, 2005, to defer Bonus Compensation actually or constructively received during the 2005 Plan Year after the date the election is filed.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc., Deferred Compensation Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 8&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage118"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 5.&nbsp;&nbsp;ACCOUNTS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	5.01.
</B>
<B>
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	Accounts.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The Committee shall establish and maintain separate Accounts with respect to each
	Participant. A Participant&#146;s Accounts shall consist of the Retirement Distribution Account and/or an
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Account. The amount of the Bonus Compensation Deferral pursuant to Sections
	4.01, 4.02, or 4.03 shall be credited by the Company to the Participant&#146;s Accounts on the day such Bonus Compensation would otherwise have been paid, in accordance with the Distribution Options elected by the Participant on his deferral
	election form. The Participant&#146;s Accounts shall be reduced by the amount of payments made by the Company to the Participant or the Participant&#146;s Beneficiary pursuant to this Plan and shall be adjusted to reflect investment gains and
	losses.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	5.02.
</B>
<B>
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	Amounts Allocated to Accounts.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	An Eligible Employee shall allocate his Bonus Compensation
	Deferrals between the Distribution Options; provided, however that 100% of such Deferrals may be allocated to one or the other of the Distribution Options.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	5.03.
</B>
<B>
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	Earnings on Accounts.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	A Participant&#146;s Accounts shall be credited with earnings from time to
	time in accordance with the deemed earnings on Investment Funds elected by the Participant. Participants may allocate their Retirement Distribution Account and their
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Account among the
	Investment Funds available under the Plan in increments specified by the Committee. The deemed rate of return, positive or negative, credited under each Investment Fund is based upon the actual investment performance of the Investment Funds listed
	on Exhibit A of the Plan. The Company reserves the right, on a prospective basis, to add or delete Investment Funds.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	5.04.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Vesting of Accounts
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	A Participant&#146;s Accounts shall be 100% vested at all times.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	5.05.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	No Actual Investment
<B>
	.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Notwithstanding that the returns credited to Participants&#146; Accounts
	are based upon the actual performance of the corresponding deemed Investment Funds selected by a Participant, the Company shall not be obligated to invest any Bonus Compensation Deferrals by Participants under this Plan and the Participant shall
	have no interest in any amounts that are actually invested to pay benefits under this Plan.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	5.06.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Statement of Accounts
<B>
	.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The Committee shall provide to each Participant, not less frequently than
	annually, a statement in such form as the Committee deems desirable setting forth the balance standing to the credit of each Participant in each of his Accounts.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc., Deferred Compensation Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 9&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage119"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	5.07.
</B>
<B>
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	Distributions from Accounts.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Any distribution made to or on behalf of a Participant from one or
	more of the Participant&#146;s Accounts in an amount that is less than the entire balance of any such Account shall be made pro rata from each of the Investment Funds to which such Account is then allocated except, and only to the extent, that the
	Participant (or Beneficiary, if applicable) elects, before the scheduled distribution date, to receive a distribution in shares of Voting Securities, up to the value of the amount to be distributed.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc., Deferred Compensation Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 10&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage120"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 6.&nbsp;&nbsp;PAYMENT OF PLAN BENEFITS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	6.01.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Payments from the Retirement Distribution Account
<B>
	.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Except as provided in Sections 6.03, 6.04,
	6.05, and 6.06, benefits under the Retirement Distribution Option shall be paid to a Participant as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(a)
</B>
<B>
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	General
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;Unless otherwise elected pursuant to Section 6.01(b) or modified pursuant to Section 6.01(c), a Participant who Retires shall receive his Retirement Distribution Account
	in the form of a lump sum on the later of (1)&nbsp;the January&nbsp;31 following the Participant&#146;s Retirement or (2)&nbsp;the first day of the seventh month following the Participant&#146;s Retirement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(b)
</B>
<B>
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Distribution Election
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;A Participant may elect a form or time of payment for his Retirement Distribution Account other than those provided in Section 6.01(a) by filing a
	distribution election form for his Retirement Distribution Account with the Committee at the same time he makes his first Bonus Compensation Deferral under the Plan to his Retirement Distribution Account. This distribution election shall determine
	the time and manner of the distribution from the Participant&#146;s Retirement Distribution Account under this Section&nbsp;6.01 if the Participant Retires, unless the election is modified pursuant to Section 6.01(c).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<U>
	Optional Forms of Distribution
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;A Participant who does not wish to receive his Retirement Distribution Account in the form of a lump sum may elect to receive his Retirement Distribution Account in the
	form of up to five (5)&nbsp;annual installments.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<U>
	Optional Times for Distribution
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;A Participant who does not wish to receive his Retirement Distribution Account as provided in Section 6.01(a) may elect for distribution of his Retirement Distribution
	Account to commence on one of the following: (A)&nbsp;January&nbsp;31 of the second Plan Year following the Participant&#146;s Retirement or (B)&nbsp;the latest of (i)&nbsp;January&nbsp;31 of the Plan Year following the Participant&#146;s
	Retirement, (ii)&nbsp;January&nbsp;31 of the Plan Year following the year in which the Participant becomes age 65, or (iii)&nbsp;the first day of the seventh month after the Participant&#146;s Retirement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(c)
</B>
<B>
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Modification of Distribution Election
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;After making his initial distribution election pursuant to Section 6.01(b) or making a Bonus Compensation Deferral that is subject to the
	default distribution rule set forth in Section 6.01(a), a Participant may file an election with the Committee, in a form satisfactory to the Committee, to modify the payment date or to specify that his Retirement Distribution Account be paid in
	installments rather than a lump sum or in a greater number of annual installments (but not more than five (5)&nbsp;annual installments); provided, however, that such election:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	is filed with the Committee at least twelve (12)&nbsp;months prior to the date of the first scheduled payment;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	is not effective until at least twelve (12)&nbsp;months after the date on which the election is made;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc., Deferred Compensation Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 11&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage121"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(3)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	defers the lump sum payment or the first installment payment with respect to which such election is made for a period of not less than five (5)&nbsp;years from the date such payment would have otherwise been made;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(4)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	does not accelerate payment of the Retirement Distribution Account; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(5)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	does not request more than five (5)&nbsp;annual installments.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(d)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Amount of Payments
</U>
	.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<U>
	Lump sum payment
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Any
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	lump-sum
</FONT>
	benefit payable in accordance with this Section&nbsp;6.01 shall be paid in an amount equal to the value of such Retirement
	Distribution Account as of the last business day of the calendar month preceding the date of payment.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<U>
	Installment Payments
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;If annual installments are elected in accordance with this Section&nbsp;6.01, the amount of the first annual installment payment shall equal (A)&nbsp;the value of the
	Participant&#146;s Retirement Distribution Account as of the last business day of the calendar month preceding the date of payment, divided by (B)&nbsp;the number of annual installment payments elected by the Participant. The remaining annual
	installments shall be paid on January&nbsp;31 of each succeeding Plan Year in an amount equal to (C)&nbsp;the value of the Participant&#146;s Retirement Distribution Account as of the last business day of the immediately preceding calendar month
	divided by (D)&nbsp;the number of installments remaining.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(e)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Benefits Upon Separation from Service
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;The Retirement Distribution Account of a Participant who Separates from Service (other than by reason of the Participant&#146;s death or
	Retirement) before the date on which his Retirement Distribution Account would otherwise be distributed shall be distributed in a lump sum on the later of (1)&nbsp;the January&nbsp;31 following the Participant&#146;s Separation from Service or
	(2)&nbsp;the first day of the seventh month after the Participant&#146;s Separation from Service.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	6.02.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	Payments from the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Account
<B>
	.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Except as provided in Sections 6.03, 6.04, 6.05, and 6.06, benefits under the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Option
	shall be paid to a Participant as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(a)
</B>
<B>
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	General
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;Except as provided in Section 6.02(e), otherwise elected pursuant to Section 6.02(b), or otherwise modified in accordance with Section 6.02(c), a Participant&#146;s
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Account shall be paid in a lump sum on the date that occurs two years after the Participant first elects to allocate a portion of his Bonus Compensation Deferral to his
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Account.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(b)
</B>
<B>
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Distribution Election
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;A Participant may elect a different form or time of payment
	for his
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Account than provided in Section 6.02(a) by filing a distribution election form for his
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Account with the
	Committee at the same time that he makes his first Bonus Compensation Deferral under the Plan to his
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Account. Except as provided in Section 6.02(e), this distribution election shall
	determine the time and manner of the distribution for the Participant&#146;s entire
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Account under this Section&nbsp;6.02,
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc., Deferred Compensation Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 12&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage122"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	unless the election is modified pursuant to Section 6.02(c).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<U>
	Optional Forms of Distribution
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;A participant who does not wish to receive his
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Account in the form of a lump sum may elect to receive his
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Account in the form of up to five (5)&nbsp;annual installments.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<U>
	Optional Times for Distribution
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;A Participant who does not wish to receive his
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Account as provided in Section 6.02(a) may elect for
	distribution of his
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Account to commence on any specified future date.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(c)
</B>
<B>
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Modification of Distribution Election
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;After making his initial distribution election pursuant to Section 6.02(b) or making a Bonus Compensation Deferral that is subject to the
	default distribution rule set forth in Section 6.02(a), a Participant may file an election with the Committee, in a form satisfactory to the Committee, to modify the payment date or to specify that his
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Account be paid in installments rather than a lump sum or in a greater number of annual installments (but not more than five (5)&nbsp;annual installments); provided, however, that such
	election:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	is filed with the Committee at least twelve (12)&nbsp;months prior to the date of the first scheduled payment;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	is not effective until at least twelve (12)&nbsp;months after the date on which the election is made;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(3)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	defers the lump sum payment or the first installment payment with respect to which such election is made for a period of not less than five (5)&nbsp;years from the date such payment would have otherwise been made;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(4)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	does not accelerate payment of the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Account; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(5)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	does not request more than five (5)&nbsp;annual installments.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(d)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Amount of Payments
</U>
	.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<U>
	Lump Sum
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Any
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	lump-sum
</FONT>
	amount payable in accordance with this Section&nbsp;6.02 shall be paid in an amount equal to the value of such
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Account as of the last business day of the calendar month preceding the date of payment.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<U>
	Installment Payments
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;If annual installment payments are elected in accordance with this Section&nbsp;6.02, the first annual installment payment shall equal (A)&nbsp;the value of such
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Account as of the last business day of the calendar month preceding the date of payment, divided by (B)&nbsp;the number of annual installment payments elected by the Participant. The
	remaining annual installments shall be paid on January&nbsp;31 of each succeeding Plan Year in an amount equal to (A)&nbsp;the value of such
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Account as of the last business day of the
	immediately preceding calendar month divided by (B)&nbsp;the number of installments remaining.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc., Deferred Compensation Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>

	Page 13&nbsp;&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage123"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(e)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Benefits Upon Separation from Service
</U>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;If a Participant (1)&nbsp;Separates from Service prior to the date on which the Participant&#146;s
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Account would otherwise be distributed, other than by reason of his death, or (2)&nbsp;elects to allocate a portion of his Bonus Compensation Deferral to his
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Account after
	he has already received a distribution from his
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Account in accordance with this Section&nbsp;6.02, any amounts credited to the Participant&#146;s
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Account shall be distributed in a lump sum on the later of (1)&nbsp;January&nbsp;31 following the Participant&#146;s Separation from Service or (2)&nbsp;the first day of the seventh month after the Participant&#146;s Separation from
	Service.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	6.03.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Payments Upon Death of Participant.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(a)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<U>
	Death of Participant Before the Commencement of Benefits
</U>
<B>
	.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:14%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	If a Participant dies before
	he begins to receive his benefits in accordance with Section&nbsp;6.01 or 6.02, benefits shall be paid to the Participant&#146;s Beneficiary in a lump sum on the first day of the month following the Participant&#146;s death, in lieu of any benefits
	otherwise payable under the Plan to or on behalf of such Participant. The amount of any lump sum benefit payable in accordance with this Section&nbsp;6.03 shall equal the value of the Participant&#146;s Account as of the last business day of
<I>
</I>
	the calendar month immediately preceding the date on which such benefit is paid.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(b)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<U>
	Death of Participant After Benefits Have Commenced
</U>
<B>
	.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:14%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	If a Participant dies after annual
	installments payable under Section&nbsp;6.01 or 6.02 from the Participant&#146;s Accounts have commenced, but before the entire balance of any such Account has been paid, any remaining installments shall be paid in lump sum on the first day of the
	month following the Participant&#146;s death.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	6.04.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Payments in the Event of an Emergency.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(a)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Eligibility for Emergency Benefit
</U>
	.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:14%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	If the Committee, in its sole discretion, determines,
	upon written request of a Participant, that the Participant has suffered an unforeseeable financial emergency (within the meaning of section 409A of the Code), the Company shall pay to the Participant from the Participant&#146;s Accounts, within
	thirty (30)&nbsp;days following such determination, an amount necessary to meet the emergency, after deduction of any and all taxes as may be required pursuant to Section&nbsp;6.08 (the &#147;Emergency Benefit&#148;). For purposes of this Plan, an
	unforeseeable financial emergency is an unexpected need for cash arising from an illness or accident of the Participant, the Participant&#146;s spouse or dependent; loss of the Participant&#146;s property due to casualty; or other similar
	extraordinary and unforeseeable circumstances arising as a result of events beyond the control of the Participant. It is intended that the Committee&#146;s determination as to whether a Participant has suffered an &#147;unforeseeable financial
	emergency&#148; shall be made consistent with the requirements under section 409(A) of the Code. Cash needs arising from foreseeable events such as the purchase of a house or education expenses for children shall not be considered to be the result
	of an unforeseeable financial emergency.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc., Deferred Compensation Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 14&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage124"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(b)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Source of Payment
</U>
	.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:14%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Emergency Benefits shall be paid first from the Participant&#146;s
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Account, if any, to the extent the balance of such
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Account is sufficient to meet the emergency. If the distribution exhausts
	the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Account, the Retirement Distribution Account may be accessed. With respect to that portion of any Account that is distributed to a Participant as an Emergency Benefit in accordance
	with this Section&nbsp;6.04, no further benefit shall be payable to the Participant under this Plan.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(c)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Restriction on Deferrals
</U>
	.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:14%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Notwithstanding anything in this Plan to the contrary and to
	the extent permitted by section 409A of the Code, a Participant who receives an Emergency Benefit in any Plan Year shall not be entitled to make a Bonus Compensation Deferral for such Plan Year.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	6.05.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Payments Upon Disability of Participant.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	If a participant becomes disabled before he begins to
	receive his benefits in accordance with Section&nbsp;6.01 or 6.02, benefits shall be paid to the Participant in a lump sum within thirty (30)&nbsp;days after the Committee finds, in its sole discretion, that the Participant has a Disability.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	6.06.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Payments Upon a Change in Control.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	If there is a Change in Control, a Participant will receive
	the full amount credited to the Participant&#146;s Retirement Distribution Account and
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Account in a lump sum. Any
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	lump-sum
</FONT>
	benefit payable in
	accordance with this paragraph shall be paid in, but not later than January&nbsp;31 of, the Plan Year following the Plan Year in which such Change in Control occurs, in an amount equal to the value of such Retirement Distribution Account and
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Account as of the last business day of the Plan Year preceding the date of payment.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	6.07.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Administrative Acceleration or Delay of Payment.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	A payment is treated as being made on the date
	when it is due under the Plan if the payment is made (a)&nbsp;no earlier than thirty (30)&nbsp;days before the due date specified by the Plan or (b)&nbsp;on a date no later than the due date specified by the Plan that is either (1)&nbsp;in the same
	Plan Year (for a payment whose specified due date is on or before September 30) or (2)&nbsp;by the fifteenth (15th) day of the third calendar month following the date specified by the Plan (for a payment whose specified due date is on or after
	October 1).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	6.08.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Withholding.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The Company shall withhold from any payment made pursuant to this Plan any taxes
	the Company reasonably believes are required to be withheld from such payments under local, state, or federal law.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc., Deferred Compensation Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 15&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage125"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	6.09.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Payment to Guardian.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	If a Plan benefit is payable to a minor or a person declared incompetent or
	to a person incapable of handling the disposition of the property, the Committee may direct payment to the guardian, legal representative or person having the care and custody of such minor, incompetent or person. The Committee may require proof of
	incompetency, minority, incapacity or guardianship as it may deem appropriate prior to distribution. Such distribution shall completely discharge the Committee and Company from all liability with respect to such benefit.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	6.10.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Effect of Payment.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The full payment of the applicable benefit under this Article 6 shall
	completely discharge all obligations on the part of the Company to the Participant (and the Participant&#146;s Beneficiary) with respect to the operation of this Plan, and the Participant&#146;s (and Participant&#146;s Beneficiary&#146;s) rights
	under this Plan shall terminate.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc., Deferred Compensation Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 16&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage126"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 7.&nbsp;&nbsp;BENEFICIARY DESIGNATION
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	7.01.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Beneficiary Designation.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Each Participant shall have the right, at any time, to designate one
	(1)&nbsp;or more persons or entity as Beneficiary (both primary as well as secondary) to whom benefits under this Plan shall be paid in the event of the Participant&#146;s death prior to complete distribution of the Participant&#146;s Account. Each
	Beneficiary designation shall be in a written form prescribed by the Committee and shall be effective only if filed with the Committee during the Participant&#146;s lifetime.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	7.02.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Changing Beneficiary.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Any Beneficiary designation may be changed without the consent of the
	previously named Beneficiary by the filing of a new Beneficiary designation with the Committee.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	7.03.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	No Beneficiary Designation.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	If any Participant fails to designate a Beneficiary in the manner
	provided above, if the designation is void, or if the Beneficiary designated by a deceased Participant dies before the Participant or before complete distribution of the Participant&#146;s benefits, the Participant&#146;s Beneficiary shall be the
	person in the first of the following classes in which there is a survivor:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(a)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	the Participant&#146;s surviving spouse;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(b)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	the Participant&#146;s children in equal shares, except that if any of the children predeceases the Participant but leaves surviving issue, then such issue shall take by right of representation the share the
	deceased child would have taken if living; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(c)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	the Participant&#146;s estate.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	7.04.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Effect of Payment.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Payment to the Beneficiary shall completely discharge the Company&#146;s
	obligations under this Plan.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc., Deferred Compensation Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 17&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage127"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 8.&nbsp;&nbsp;ADMINISTRATION OF THE PLAN
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	8.01.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Committee Duties.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	This Plan shall be administered by the Committee, which shall consist of not
	less than three (3)&nbsp;persons, who may also be Participants in this Plan, and are named as the initial Committee in this Plan or as subsequently appointed by the Board or its delegee, except in the event of a Change in Control as provided in
	Section&nbsp;8.05 below. The Committee shall have the full discretionary authority to (a)&nbsp;make, amend, interpret and enforce all appropriate rules and regulations for the administration of the Plan and decide or resolve any and all questions,
	including interpretations of the Plan, as they may arise in such administration, and (b)&nbsp;establish and maintain an investment policy for the Plan, select appropriate Investment Funds to implement the investment policy, monitor the performance
	of such Investment Funds, and change the selection of Investment Funds from time to time in a manner consistent with the objectives of the investment policy. A Committee member who is also a Participant in this Plan shall be prohibited from voting
	on any matter which may, in the opinion of the balance of the Committee, directly affect the Committee member&#146;s individual rights or benefits under this Plan. A majority vote of the Committee members permitted to vote shall control any
	decision.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	8.02.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Agents.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The Committee may, from time to time, employ agents and delegate to them such
	administrative duties as it sees fit, and may from time to time consult with counsel who may be counsel to the Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	8.03.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Binding Effect of Decisions.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The decision or action of the Committee with respect to any
	question arising out of or in connection with the administration, interpretation and application of the Plan and the rules and regulations promulgated hereunder shall be final, conclusive and binding upon all persons having any interest in the Plan.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	8.04.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Indemnity of Committee.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The Company shall indemnify and hold harmless each member of the
	Committee from any and all claims, losses, damages, expenses (including counsel fees) and liability (including any amounts paid in settlement of any claim or any other matter with the consent of the Board) arising from any act or omission of such
	member, except when the same is due to gross negligence or willful misconduct.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	8.05.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Election of Committee After Change in Control.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	After a Change in Control, vacancies on the
	Committee shall be filled by majority vote of the remaining Committee members and Committee members may be removed only by such a vote. If no Committee members remain, a new Committee shall be elected by majority vote of the Participants in the Plan
	immediately preceding such Change in Control. No amendment shall be made to Article 8 or other Plan provisions regarding Committee authority with respect to the Plan without prior approval by the Committee.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc., Deferred Compensation Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 18&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage128"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 9.&nbsp;&nbsp;CLAIMS PROCEDURE
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	9.01.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Claim.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Any person or entity claiming a benefit, requesting an interpretation or ruling under the
	Plan (hereinafter referred to as &#147;Claimant&#148;), or requesting information under the Plan shall present the request in writing to the Corporate Human Resources Department, which shall respond in writing as soon as practical, but not later
	than ninety (90)&nbsp;days after receipt of the claim, unless the Corporate Human Resources Department notifies the Claimant that special circumstances require an additional period of time (not to exceed 90 days) to review the claim properly.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	9.02.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Denial of Claim.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	If the claim or request is denied, the written notice of denial shall state:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(a)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	the reasons for denial, with specific reference to the Plan provisions on which the denial is based;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(b)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	a description of any additional material or information required and an explanation of why it is necessary; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(c)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	an explanation of the Plan&#146;s claim review procedure, including a statement of the Claimant&#146;s right to bring a civil action under section 502(a) of ERISA if the claim denial is denied (in whole or in
	part) on appeal.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	9.03.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Review of Claim.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Any Claimant whose claim or request is denied or who has not received a
	response within the time limits set forth above may request a review by notice given in writing to the Committee. Such request must be made within sixty (60)&nbsp;days after receipt by the Claimant of the written notice of denial, or, in the event
	Claimant has not received a timely response, within 60 days after the date the Corporate Human Resources Department was required to respond to the claim under Section&nbsp;9.01. The claim or request shall be reviewed by the Committee which may, but
	shall not be required to, grant the Claimant a hearing. On review, the claimant may have representation, examine pertinent documents, and submit issues and comments in writing.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	9.04.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Final Decision.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The decision on review shall normally be made within sixty (60)&nbsp;days after
	the Committee&#146;s receipt of claimant&#146;s claim or request. If an extension of time is required for a hearing or other special circumstances, the Claimant shall be notified and the time limit shall be one hundred twenty (120)&nbsp;days. The
	decision shall be in writing and shall state the reasons and the relevant Plan provisions. All decisions on review shall be final and bind all parties concerned.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc., Deferred Compensation Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 19&nbsp;&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage129"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	9.05.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Claims for Disability Benefits.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	To the extent required by law, the Committee shall develop
	alternative claims procedures that shall apply with respect to claims for Disability benefits.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">

	&nbsp;&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc., Deferred Compensation Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
