<A NAME="eolPage130"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 10.&nbsp;&nbsp;AMENDMENT AND TERMINATION OF PLAN
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The Plan may be amended, suspended, discontinued or terminated at any time by the Board; provided, however, that no such amendment, suspension, discontinuance or
	termination shall reduce or in any manner adversely affect the rights of any Participant with respect to benefits that are payable or may become payable under the Plan based upon the balance of the Participant&#146;s Retirement Account and
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Account as of the effective date of such amendment, suspension, discontinuance or termination.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc., Deferred Compensation Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 21&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage131"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 11. MISCELLANEOUS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	11.01.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Hypothetical Accounts.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Each account and investment established under the Plan shall be
	hypothetical in nature and shall be maintained for bookkeeping purposes only. The accounts established under the Plan shall hold no actual funds or assets. Any liability of the Company to any Participant, former Participant, or Beneficiary with
	respect to a right to payment shall be based solely upon contractual obligations created by the Plan. Neither the Company, the Board, nor any other person shall be deemed to be a trustee of any amounts to be paid under the Plan. Nothing contained in
	the Plan, and no action taken pursuant to its provisions, shall create or be construed to create a trust of any kind, or a fiduciary relationship, between or among the Company, a Participant, or any other person.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	11.02.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	Company Obligation.
<B>
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The Company shall not be required to fund any obligations under the
	Plan. Except as provided in Section&nbsp;11.03, any assets that may be accumulated by the Company to meet its obligations under the Plan shall for all purposes be part of the general assets of the Company. To the extent that any Participant or
	Beneficiary acquires a right to receive payments under the Plan for which the Company is liable, such rights shall be no greater than the rights of any unsecured general creditor of the Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	11.03.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	Trust Fund.
<B>
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The Company shall be responsible for the payment of all benefits provided
	under the Plan. Before a Change in Control, at its discretion, the Company may establish one (1)&nbsp;or more trusts, with such trustees as the Committee may approve, for the purpose of assisting in the payment of such benefits. Following a Change
	in Control, the Company shall establish one (1)&nbsp;or more trusts, with such trustees as the Committee may approve, for the purpose of assisting in the payment of such benefits. If, as a result of a Change in Control, Voting Securities will no
	longer exist, the Committee may, in its sole discretion, allocate the value of each Participant&#146;s Voting Securities to an Investment Fund. Although such a trust may be irrevocable, its assets shall be held for payment of all Company&#146;s
	general creditors in the event of insolvency. To the extent any benefits provided under the Plan are paid from any such trust, Company shall have no further obligation to pay them. If not paid from the trust, such benefits shall remain the
	obligation of Company. No assets of the trust or the Company shall become restricted to provide benefits under the Plan in connection with a change in the Company&#146;s financial health.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	11.04.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	Nonassignability.
<B>
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Neither a Participant nor any other person shall have any right to
	commute, sell, assign, transfer, pledge, anticipate, mortgage or otherwise encumber, transfer, hypothecate or convey in advance of actual receipt the amounts, if any, payable hereunder, or any part thereof, which are, and all rights to which are,
	expressly declared to be unassignable and
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	non-transferable.
</FONT>
	No part of the amounts payable shall, prior to actual payment, be subject to seizure or sequestration for the payment of any debts, judgements,
	alimony or separate maintenance owed by a Participant or any other person, nor be transferable by operation of law in the event of a Participant&#146;s or any other person&#146;s bankruptcy or insolvency, except that
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc., Deferred Compensation Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 22&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage132"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	the Committee may recognize a domestic relations order in accordance with procedures that i may establish for this purpose.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	11.05.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	Not a Contract of Employment.
<B>
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	This Plan shall not constitute a contract of employment
	between Company and the Participant. Nothing in this Plan shall give a Participant the right to be retained in the service of Company or to interfere with the right of the Company to discipline or discharge a Participant at any time.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	11.06.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	Protective Provisions
<B>
	.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	A Participant will cooperate with Company by furnishing any and
	all information requested by Company, in order to facilitate the payment of benefits hereunder, and by taking such other action as may be requested by Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	11.07.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	Governing Law
<B>
	.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The Plan shall be construed and enforced in accordance with applicable
	federal law and, to the extent not preempted by federal law, the laws of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania (without regard to the legislative or judicial conflict of laws rules of any state or other jurisdiction).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	11.08.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	Severability
<B>
	.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	If any provision of this Plan is held unenforceable, the remainder of the
	Plan shall continue in full force and effect without regard to such unenforceable provision and shall be applied as though the unenforceable provision were not contained in the Plan. In addition, if any provision of the Plan shall be found to
	violate section 409A of the Code or otherwise result in benefits under the Plan being subject to income tax prior to distribution, such provision shall be void and unenforceable, and the Plan shall be administered without regard to such provision.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	11.09.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	Headings
<B>
	.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Headings are inserted in this Plan for convenience of reference only and are to
	be ignored in the construction of the provisions of the Plan.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	11.10.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	Notice
<B>
	.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Any notice required or permitted under the Plan shall be sufficient if in writing
	and hand delivered or sent by registered mail, certified mail, or reputable overnight delivery service. Such notice shall be deemed given as of the date of delivery or, if delivery is made by mail or overnight delivery, as of the date shown on the
	postmark on the receipt for registration or certification or on the records of the overnight delivery company. Mailed notice to the Committee shall be directed to the Company&#146;s address. Mailed notice to a Participant or Beneficiary shall be
	directed to the individual&#146;s last known address in Company&#146;s records.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc., Deferred Compensation Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;

	Page 23&nbsp;&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage133"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	11.11.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Successors.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The provisions of this Plan shall bind the Company and its successors and assigns.
	The term successors as used herein shall include any corporate or other business entity which shall, whether by merger, consolidation, purchase or otherwise acquire all or substantially all of the business and assets of Company, and successors of
	any such corporation or other business entity.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:60PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:15%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	IN WITNESS WHEREOF, and as evidence of the adoption of this Plan by the Company, AMETEK, Inc. has
	executed the same this 1
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	st
</SUP>
	day of December, 2016.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<DIV ALIGN="RIGHT">

<A NAME="eolPage134"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	EXHIBIT A TO AMETEK, INC. DEFERRED COMPENSATION PLAN
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	LIST OF INVESTMENT FUNDS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:24PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	1.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The &#147;
<B>
<U>
	AMETEK Fund
</U>
</B>
	&#148; which consists of deemed investments in whole and fractional shares of Voting Securities based on the average closing price of the shares on the principal exchange on which the
	shares are traded for the last 10 trading days of the month preceding the deemed investment. Deemed dividends on the shares allocated to the AMETEK Fund shall be credited to the Fund during a Plan Year when dividends are actually paid on shares of
	Voting Securities and shall be deemed to be invested in additional shares of Voting Securities on the last business day of such Plan Year based on the closing price of the shares on the principal exchange on which the shares are traded for the first
	10 trading days of December preceding the deemed investment.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:14PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	2.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The &#147;
<B>
<U>
	Interest Fund
</U>
</B>
	&#148; which shall be deemed to earn compound interest on principal at one and
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	one-half
</FONT>
	percent higher than the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	10-year
</FONT>
	Treasury Note rate as set forth in The Wall Street Journal as of the first business day of each calendar quarter.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc., Deferred Compensation Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Exhibit A
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage135"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	APPENDIX A
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<B>
	The following Plan provisions apply only to amounts earned and vested (within the meaning of Section&nbsp;409A of the Code) before January&nbsp;1, 2005, and any
	earnings on such amounts (&#147;Grandfathered Amounts&#148;). Amounts earned and vested after December&nbsp;31, 2004, and any earnings thereon, are subject to the provisions of the Plan as amended and restated, effective January&nbsp;1, 2005, or any
	subsequent amendment and restatement of the Plan.
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<B>
	The purpose of this Appendix A is to preserve the terms of the Plan that govern Grandfathered Amounts, and
	to prevent the Grandfathered Amounts from becoming subject to Section 409A of the Code. No amendment to this Appendix A that would constitute a &#147;material modification&#148; for purposes of Section 409A shall be effective unless the amending
	instrument specifically provides that it is intended to materially modify this Appendix A and to cause the Grandfathered Amounts to become subject to Section 409A of the Code.
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<B>
	Although this Appendix A is intended to prevent the Grandfathered Amounts from being subject to Section 409A, neither the Company nor any Employer (nor any
	representative of the Company) shall be liable for any adverse tax consequence suffered by a Participant or Beneficiary if a Grandfathered Amount becomes subject to Section 409A.
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:42PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	AMETEK, Inc.
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	Deferred Compensation Plan
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	Effective October&nbsp;1, 1999
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 1
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	PURPOSE
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	In recognition of the services provided by certain key employees, the Board of Directors of AMETEK, Inc. hereby adopts the AMETEK, Inc Deferred
	Compensation Plan (the &#147;Plan&#148;) to make additional retirement benefits and increased financial security, on a
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	tax-favored
</FONT>
	basis, available to those individuals, effective October&nbsp;1, 1999.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 2
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	DEFINITIONS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<U>
	Affiliate
</U>
	. &#147;Affiliate&#148; means any firm, partnership, or corporation that directly or indirectly through one or more intermediaries,
	controls, is controlled by, or is under common control with AMETEK. &#147;Affiliate&#148; also includes any other organization similarly related to the Company that is designated as such by the Board.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<U>
	AMETEK
</U>
	. &#147;AMETEK&#148; means AMETEK, Inc.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<U>
	Beneficiary
</U>
	. &#147;Beneficiary&#148; means the person or persons designated as such in accordance with Section&nbsp;12.3.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc., Deferred Compensation Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Appendix A Page A-1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage136"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<U>
	Board
</U>
	. &#147;Board&#148; means the Board of Directors of AMETEK.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<U>
	Bonus Compensation
</U>
	. &#147;Bonus Compensation&#148; means the portion of an Eligible Employee&#146;s Compensation consisting of the amount of the
	incentive to be paid to an Eligible Employee under the Company&#146;s incentive compensation plan for a Plan Year which does not include any bonus paid to an Eligible Employee and characterized by the Company as a &#147;sign on bonus&#148; or other
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	&#147;non-recurring
</FONT>
	incentive bonus.&#148;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<U>
	Bonus Compensation Deferral
</U>
	. &#147;Bonus Compensation
	Deferral&#148; means that portion of Bonus Compensation as to which an Eligible Employee has made an annual irrevocable election to defer receipt until the date specified under the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution
	Option and/or the Retirement Distribution Option.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<U>
	Change of Control
</U>
	. &#147;Change of Control&#148; means:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Any person (except the Participant, the Participant&#146;s affiliates and associates, the Company, any subsidiary
	of the Company, any employee benefit plan of the Company or of any subsidiary of the Company, or any person or entity organized, appointed or established by the Company for or pursuant to the terms of any such employee benefit plan), together with
	all affiliates and associates of such person, becomes the beneficial owner, directly or indirectly, in the aggregate of 20% or more of the value of the outstanding equity or combined voting power of the then outstanding Voting Securities; or
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The stockholders of AMETEK approve a merger or consolidation the result of which is that the stockholders of
	AMETEK do not own or control at least 50% or more of the value of the outstanding equity or combined voting power of the then outstanding Voting Securities, or there occurs a sale or other disposition of all or substantially all of AMETEK&#146;s
	assets or a plan of liquidation is approved; provided, however, that an internal reorganization, even if the employment of the Participant is transferred to another company, shall not constitute a &#147;Change of Control&#148; if the stockholders of
	AMETEK own or control, directly or indirectly, at least 50% or more of the value of the outstanding equity or combined voting power of the then outstanding voting securities of the new company entitled to vote generally in the election of directors
	of that company.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<U>
	Code
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Code&#148; means the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended from time to time.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<U>
	Committee
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Committee&#148; means the persons appointed by the Board to administer the Plan and which also may act for the
	Company or the Board in making decisions and performing specified duties under the Plan.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<U>
	Company
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Company&#148; means
	AMETEK and any Affiliate which is authorized by the Board to adopt the Plan and cover its Eligible Employees and whose designation as such has become effective upon acceptance of such status by the board of directors of the Affiliate. An Affiliate
	may revoke its acceptance of such designation at any time, but until such acceptance has been revoked, all the provisions of the Plan and amendments thereto shall apply to the Eligible Employees of the Affiliate. In the event the designation is
	revoked by the board of directors of an Affiliate, the Plan shall be deemed terminated only with respect to such Affiliate.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<U>
	Compensation
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Compensation&#148; shall mean Bonus Compensation earned in a Plan Year plus the total remuneration paid to the
	Eligible Employee for the Plan Year in which the Bonus Compensation is earned, in excess of the compensation limit of section 401(a)(17) of the Code, as in effect from time to time ($160,000 on the Effective Date).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc., Deferred Compensation Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Appendix A Page A-2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage137"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<U>
	Disabled
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Disabled&#148; means a mental or physical condition which would qualify a
	Participant for benefits under the AMETEK Long Term Disability Plan if he or she were a participant in that plan.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<U>
	Distribution
	Option
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Distribution Option&#148; means the two distribution options which are available under the Plan, consisting of the Retirement Distribution Option and the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution
	Option.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<U>
	Distribution Option Account
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Distribution Option Account&#148; or &#147;Accounts&#148; means, with respect to a
	Participant, the Retirement Distribution Account and/or the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Account established on the books of account of the Company, pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.1.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<U>
	Earnings Crediting Options
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Earnings Crediting Options&#148; means the deemed Investment Funds that may be selected by the
	Participant from time to time pursuant to which deemed earnings are credited to the Participant&#146;s Distribution Option Accounts.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<U>
	Effective
	Date
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Effective Date&#148; means the effective date of the Plan which is October&nbsp;1, 1999.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<U>
	Eligible
	Employee
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Eligible Employee&#148; means an Employee who (i)&nbsp;the Committee determines is scheduled, in the next Plan Year, to have Compensation, and (ii)&nbsp;is designated by the Committee, acting on behalf of the Company,
	as eligible to participate in the Plan.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<U>
	Employee
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Employee&#148; means any individual employed by the Company on a regular,
	full-time basis (in accordance with the personnel policies and practices of the Company), including citizens of the United States employed outside of their home country and resident aliens employed in the United States; provided, however, that to
	qualify as an &#147;Employee&#148; for purposes of the Plan, the individual must be a member of a group of &#147;key management or other highly compensated employees&#148; within the meaning of Sections 201, 301 and 401 of the Employee Retirement
	Income Security Act of 1974, as amended.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<U>
	Enrollment Agreement
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Enrollment Agreement&#148; means the authorization form
	which an Eligible Employee files with the Committee to participate in the Plan.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<U>
	Investment Funds
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Investment Funds&#148;
	means the separate deemed investments which a Participant may direct be used to value the growth of the Participant&#146;s Bonus Compensation Deferrals while credited to the Participant&#146;s Accounts. On the Effective Date, there shall be two
	Investment Funds. One Investment Fund shall be the &#147;AMETEK Fund&#148; consisting of deemed investments in whole and fractional shares of Voting Securities based on the average closing price of the shares on the principal exchange on which the
	shares are traded for the last 10 trading days of the month preceding the deemed investment. Deemed dividends on the shares allocated to the AMETEK Fund shall be credited to the Fund during a Plan Year when dividends are actually paid on shares of
	Voting Securities and shall be deemed to be invested in additional shares of Voting Securities on the last business day of such Plan Year based on the closing price of the shares on the principal exchange on which the shares are traded for the first
	10 trading days of December preceding the deemed investment. The second Investment Fund
<I>
</I>
	shall be the &#147;Interest Fund&#148; which shall be deemed to earn compound interest on principal at one and
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	one-half
</FONT>
	percent higher than the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	10-year
</FONT>
	Treasury Note rate as set forth in
<U>
	The Wall Street Journal
</U>
	as of the first business day of each calendar quarter.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<U>
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Account
</U>
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Account&#148; means the Account
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">

</TD>

</TD>

<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">

	&nbsp;&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc., Deferred Compensation Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Appendix A Page A-3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage138"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	maintained for a Participant to which Bonus Compensation Deferrals are credited pursuant to the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Option.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<U>
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Option
</U>
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Option&#148; means the Distribution Option pursuant to which benefits are payable in accordance with Section&nbsp;7.2.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<U>
	Participant
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Participant&#148; means an Eligible Employee who has filed a completed and executed Enrollment Agreement with the
	Committee or its designee and is participating in the Plan in accordance with the provisions of Article 4. In the event of the death or incompetency of a Participant, the term shall mean the Participant&#146;s personal representative or guardian. An
	individual shall remain a Participant until that individual has received full distribution of any amount credited to the Participant&#146;s Account.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<U>
	Plan
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Plan&#148; means this plan, called the AMETEK, Inc. Deferred Compensation Plan, as amended from time to time.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<U>
	Plan Year
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Plan Year&#148; means the 12 month period beginning on each January&nbsp;1 and ending on the following
	December&nbsp;31 except that the first Plan Year shall begin on the Effective Date.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<U>
	Retirement
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Retirement&#148; means the
	termination of the Participant&#146;s Service with the Company (for reasons other than death) at or after age 65, or, if the Participant has 10 or more years of Service, at or after age 55.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<U>
	Retirement Distribution Account
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Retirement Distribution Account&#148; means the Account maintained for a Participant to which
	Bonus Compensation Deferrals are credited pursuant to the Retirement Distribution Option.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<U>
	Retirement Distribution
	Option
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Retirement Distribution Option&#148; means the Distribution Option pursuant to which benefits are payable in accordance with Section&nbsp;7.1.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<U>
	Service
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Service&#148; means the period of time during which an employment relationship exists between an Employee and the
	Company ending on the Participant&#146;s Termination Date, but including any period during which the Employee is on an approved leave of absence, whether paid or unpaid. &#147;Service&#148; also includes employment with an Affiliate if an Employee
	transfers directly between the Company and the Affiliate.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<U>
	Termination Date
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Termination Date&#148; means the date of
	termination of a Participant&#146;s Service with the Company and its Affiliates and shall be determined without reference to any compensation continuation arrangement or severance benefit arrangement that may be applicable.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<U>
	Voting Securities
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Voting Securities&#148; means the common securities of AMETEK which carry the right to vote generally in the
	election of directors.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 3
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ADMINISTRATION OF THE PLAN AND DISCRETION
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	3.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Committee shall have full power and authority to interpret the Plan, to prescribe, amend and rescind any
	rules, forms and procedures as it deems necessary or appropriate for the proper administration of the Plan and to make any other determinations and to
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">

</TD>

	&nbsp;&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc., Deferred Compensation Plan
</TD>

	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Appendix A Page A-4&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage139"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	take any other such actions as it deems necessary or advisable in carrying out its duties under the Plan. All action taken by the Committee arising out of, or in connection with, the
	administration of the Plan or any rules adopted thereunder, shall, in each case, lie within its sole discretion, and shall be final, conclusive and binding upon the Company, the Board, all Employees, all Beneficiaries and all persons and entities
	having an interest therein.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	3.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;All expenses of administering the Plan shall be paid by the Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	3.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company shall indemnify and hold harmless each member of the Committee from any and all claims, losses,
	damages, expenses (including counsel fees) and liability (including any amounts paid in settlement of any claim or any other matter with the consent of the Board) arising from any act or omission of such member, except when the same is due to gross
	negligence or willful misconduct.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	3.4&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Any decisions, actions or interpretations to be made under the Plan by the
	Company, the Board or Committee, acting on behalf of either, shall be made in its respective sole discretion, not as a fiduciary and need not be uniformly applied to similarly situated individuals and shall be final, binding and conclusive on all
	persons interested in the Plan.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 4
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	PARTICIPATION
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	4.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	Election to Participate
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Annually, each Eligible Employee shall be offered the opportunity to
	elect a Bonus Compensation Deferral. Any Eligible Employee may enroll in the Plan effective as of the first day of a Plan Year by filing a completed and fully executed Enrollment Agreement with the Committee by March&nbsp;31 of the Plan Year during
	which such Bonus Compensation is to be earned. Pursuant to said Enrollment Agreement, the Eligible Employee shall irrevocably elect (a)&nbsp;the percentage, in a whole percentage, or the dollar amount the Eligible Employee desires to be the Eligible
	Employee&#146;s Bonus Compensation Deferral (as a result of payroll reduction), (b) the Distribution Option Account(s), in 25% increments, to which such amounts will be credited, (c)&nbsp;the Investment Fund(s) selected by the Participant and
	(d)&nbsp;such other information as the Committee shall require. The Enrollment Agreement filed by an Eligible Employee must also set forth the Participant&#146;s initial election as to the time and manner of distribution of amounts credited to, and
	related earnings from, the Retirement Distribution Account and/or the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Account established pursuant to that Enrollment Agreement. The Committee may establish minimum or maximum amounts
	that may be deferred under this Section and may change such standards from time to time. Any such limits shall be communicated by the Committee to the Participants prior to the commencement of a Plan Year.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	4.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	New Eligible Employees
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Committee may, in its discretion, permit Employees who first become
	Eligible Employees after the beginning of a Plan Year to enroll in the Plan for that Plan Year by filing a completed and fully executed Enrollment Agreement, in accordance with Section&nbsp;4.1, as soon as practicable following the date the Employee
	becomes an Eligible Employee but, in any event, within 30 days after such date.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 5
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	DISTRIBUTION OPTION ACCOUNTS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	5.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	Distribution Option Accounts
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Committee shall establish and maintain separate Distribution
	Option Accounts with respect to each Participant. A Participant&#146;s Distribution Option Accounts shall consist of the Retirement Distribution Account and/or an In-
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc., Deferred Compensation Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Appendix A Page A-5&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage140"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Service Distribution Account. The amount of the Bonus Compensation Deferral pursuant to Section&nbsp;4.1 or Section&nbsp;4.2 shall be credited by the Company to the Participant&#146;s
	Distribution Option Accounts on the day such Bonus Compensation would otherwise have been paid, in accordance with the Distribution Option(s) irrevocably elected by the Participant in the Enrollment Agreement. Any amount once taken into account as
	Compensation for purposes of this Plan shall not be taken into account thereafter. The Participant&#146;s Distribution Option Accounts shall be reduced by the amount of payments made by the Company to the Participant or the Participant&#146;s
	Beneficiary pursuant to this Plan.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	5.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	Earnings on Distribution Option Accounts
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;A
	Participant&#146;s Distribution Option Accounts shall be credited with earnings in accordance with the Earnings Crediting Options elected by the Participant from time to time. Participants may allocate their Retirement Distribution Account and their
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	In-Service
</FONT>
	Distribution Account among the Earnings Crediting Options available under the Plan only in 10% increments. The deemed rate of return, positive or negative, credited under each Earnings Crediting
	Option is based upon the actual investment performance of the Voting Securities credited to the AMETEK Fund or the interest rate credited to the Interest Fund, as applicable, unless other Investment Fund(s) are added. The Company reserves the right,
	on a prospective basis, to add or delete Investment Funds.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	5.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	Earnings Crediting
	Options
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding that the returns credited to Participants&#146; Distribution Option Accounts under the Earnings Crediting Options are based upon the actual performance of the corresponding deemed Investment Funds selected by
	a Participant, the Company shall not be obligated to invest any Bonus Compensation Deferrals by Participants under this Plan.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	5.4&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	Statement of Accounts
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Committee shall provide to each Participant, not less
	frequently than annually, a statement in such form as the Committee deems desirable setting forth the balance standing to the credit of each Participant in each of his Distribution Option Accounts.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	5.5&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	Distributions from Accounts
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Any distribution made to or on behalf of a Participant
	from one or more of the Participant&#146;s Distribution Option Accounts in an amount which is less than the entire balance of any such Account shall be made pro rata from each of the Earnings Crediting Options to which such Account is then allocated
	except, and only to the extent, that the Participant (or Beneficiary, if applicable) elects to receive a distribution in shares of Voting Securities, up to the value of the amount to be distributed.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 6
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	DISTRIBUTION OPTIONS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	6.1&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	Election of Distribution Option
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;In the first completed and fully executed Enrollment Agreement filed with the
	Committee, an Eligible Employee shall elect the time and manner of payment for each of the Eligible Employee&#146;s Distribution Option Accounts. Annually, the Eligible Employee shall allocate his or her Bonus Compensation Deferrals between the
	Distribution Options in increments of 25%; provided, however that 100% of such Deferrals may be allocated to one or the other of the Distribution Options.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:14PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	6.2&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	Retirement Distribution Option
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to Section&nbsp;7.1, distribution of the Participant&#146;s Retirement
	Distribution Account, if any, shall commence upon January 31
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	st
</SUP>
	of (a)&nbsp;the Plan Year following the Participant&#146;s Retirement, (b)&nbsp;the second Plan Year following the Participant&#146;s
	Retirement or (c)&nbsp;the later of the Plan Year following the Participant&#146;s Retirement or the Plan Year
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc., Deferred Compensation Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
