<A NAME="eolPage187"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 8.&nbsp;&nbsp;ADMINISTRATION
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	8.01.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Committee; Duties.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	This Plan shall be administered by the Committee, which shall consist of not
	less than three (3)&nbsp;persons, who may also be Participants in this Plan, and are named as the initial Committee in this Plan or as subsequently appointed by the Board or its delegee, except in the event of a Change in Control as provided in
	Section&nbsp;8.05 below. The Committee shall have the full discretionary authority to (a)&nbsp;make, amend, interpret and enforce all appropriate rules and regulations for the administration of the Plan and decide or resolve any and all questions,
	including interpretations of the Plan, as they may arise in such administration, and (b)&nbsp;establish and maintain an investment policy for the Life Insurance Policies, select appropriate investment options to implement the investment policy,
	monitor the performance of such investment options, and change the selection of investment options from time to time in a manner consistent with the objectives of the investment policy. A Committee member who is also a Participant in this Plan shall
	be prohibited from voting on any matter which may, in the opinion of the balance of the Committee, directly affect the Committee member&#146;s rights or benefits under this Plan. A majority vote of the Committee members permitted to vote shall
	control any decision.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	8.02.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Agents.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The Committee may, from time to time, employ agents and delegate to them such
	administrative duties as it sees fit, and may from time to time consult with counsel who may be counsel to the Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	8.03.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Binding Effect of Decisions.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The decision or action of the Committee with respect to any
	question arising out of or in connection with the administration, interpretation and application of the Plan and the rules and regulations promulgated hereunder shall be final, conclusive and binding upon all persons having any interest in the Plan.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	8.04.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Indemnity of Committee.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The Company shall indemnify and hold harmless the members of the
	Committee against any and all claims, loss, damage, expense (including counsel fees) or liability (including any amounts paid in settlement of any claim or any other matter with the consent of the Board) arising from any action or failure to act
	with respect to this Plan on account of such member&#146;s service on the Committee, except in the case of gross negligence or willful misconduct.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	8.05.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Election of Committee After Change in Control.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	After a Change in Control, vacancies on the
	Committee shall be filled by majority vote of the remaining Committee members and Committee members may be removed only by such a vote. If no Committee members remain, a new Committee shall be elected by majority vote of the Participants in the Plan
	immediately preceding such Change in Control. No amendment shall be made to Article 8 or other Plan provisions regarding Committee authority with respect to the Plan without prior approval by the Committee.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="73%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="2%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="25%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc., 2004 Executive Death Benefit Plan (Restated January 1, 2017)
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 16&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage188"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 9.&nbsp;&nbsp;CLAIMS PROCEDURE
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	9.01.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Claim.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Any person or entity claiming a benefit under the Plan (hereinafter referred to as
	&#147;Claimant&#148;) shall present the request in writing to the Corporate Human Resources Department, which shall respond in writing as soon as practical, but not later than ninety (90)&nbsp;days after receipt of the claim, unless the Corporate
	Human Resources Department notifies the Claimant that special circumstances require an additional period of time (not to exceed 90 days) to review the claim properly.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	9.02.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Denial of Claim.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	If the claim or request is denied, the written notice of denial shall state:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(a)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	the reasons for denial, with specific reference to the Plan provisions on which the denial is based;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(b)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	a description of any additional material or information required and an explanation of why it is necessary; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(c)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	an explanation of the Plan&#146;s claim review procedure, including a statement of the Claimant&#146;s right to bring a civil action under section 502(a) of ERISA if the claim is denied (in whole or in part) on
	appeal.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	9.03.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Review of Claim.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Any Claimant whose claim or request is denied or who has not received a
	response within the time limits set forth above may request a review by notice given in writing to the Committee. Such request must be made within sixty (60)&nbsp;days after receipt by the Claimant of the written notice of denial, or, in the event
	Claimant has not received a timely response, within 60 days after the date the Corporate Human Resources Department was required to respond to the claim under Section&nbsp;9.01. The claim or request shall be reviewed by the Committee which may, but
	shall not be required to, grant the Claimant a hearing. On review, the claimant may have representation, examine pertinent documents, and submit issues and comments in writing.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	9.04.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Final Decision.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The decision on review shall normally be made within sixty (60)&nbsp;days after
	the Committee&#146;s receipt of claimant&#146;s claim or request. If an extension of time is required for a hearing or other special circumstances, the Claimant shall be notified and the time limit shall be one hundred twenty (120) days. The
	decision shall be in writing and shall state the reasons and the relevant Plan provisions. All decisions on review shall be final and bind all parties concerned.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="73%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="2%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="25%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc., 2004 Executive Death Benefit Plan (Restated January 1, 2017)
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 17&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage189"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	9.05.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Claims for Disability Benefits.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	To the extent required by law, the Committee shall develop
	alternative claims procedures that shall apply with respect to claims for Disability benefits.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="73%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="2%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="25%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc., 2004 Executive Death Benefit Plan (Restated January 1, 2017)
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 18&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage190"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 10.&nbsp;&nbsp;AMENDMENT AND TERMINATION OF PLAN
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	10.01.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Amendment.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The Committee may at any time amend the Plan by written instrument executed by all
	Committee members, notice of which shall be given to all Participants and to any Beneficiary receiving installment payments, subject to the following:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(a)
</B>
<B>
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Preservation of Account Balance
</U>
</B>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;No amendment shall reduce the amount accrued in any Account as of the date such notice of the amendment is given.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(b)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Changes in Interest Rate
</U>
</B>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;No amendment shall retroactively reduce the rate of interest which had been credited to a Participant&#146;s Account.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(c)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Change in Control
</U>
</B>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding the foregoing, the Plan may not be amended in any material respect, except as is provided below in Section&nbsp;10.02, during the two (2)&nbsp;year
	period following a Change in Control.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	10.02.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Company&#146;s Right to Terminate.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(a)
</B>
<B>
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Termination
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;The Committee may at any time partially or completely terminate the Plan. Any such termination must be made by written instrument executed by the Committee and
	approved by the Board. In the event of complete termination, the Plan shall cease to operate and the Company shall have the right to accelerate payments of any vested Retirement Benefit or Death Benefit to the appropriate Participant or Beneficiary
	pursuant to Section 10.02(b).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(b)
</B>
<B>
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Effect of Termination
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon the complete termination of the Plan by the Committee and termination of all arrangements sponsored by the Company that would be aggregated with the
	Plan under section 409A of the Code, the Company shall have the right, in its sole discretion, and notwithstanding any elections made by the Participant, to pay the Participant&#146;s Retirement Benefit or Death Benefit in the form of a lump sum, to
	the extent permitted under section 409A of the Code. All payments that may be made pursuant to this Section 10.02(b), shall be made no earlier than the thirteenth (13th) month and no later than the twenty-fourth (24th) month after the termination of
	the Plan. If the Company exercises its discretion to accelerate payments under this Section 10.02(b), it shall not adopt any new arrangement that would have been aggregated with the Plan under section 409A of the Code within three (3)&nbsp;years
	following the date of the Plan&#146;s termination.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="73%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="2%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="25%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc., 2004 Executive Death Benefit Plan (Restated January 1, 2017)
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 19&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage191"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 11.&nbsp;&nbsp;MISCELLANEOUS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	11.01.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Hypothetical Accounts.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Each account and investment established under the Plan shall be
	hypothetical in nature and shall be maintained for bookkeeping purposes only. The accounts established under the Plan shall hold no actual funds or assets. Any liability of the Company to any Participant, former Participant, or Beneficiary with
	respect to a right to payment shall be based solely upon contractual obligations created by the Plan. Neither the Company, the Board, nor any other person shall be deemed to be a trustee of any amounts to be paid under the Plan. Nothing contained in
	the Plan, and no action taken pursuant to its provisions, shall create or be construed to create a trust of any kind, or a fiduciary relationship, between or among the Company, a Participant, or any other person.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	11.02.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Company Obligation.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The Company shall not be required to fund any obligations under the Plan.
	Except as provided in Section&nbsp;11.03, any assets that may be accumulated by the Company to meet its obligations under the Plan shall for all purposes be part of the general assets of the Company. To the extent that any Participant or Beneficiary
	acquires a right to receive payments under the Plan for which the Company is liable, such rights shall be no greater than the rights of any unsecured general creditor of the Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	11.03.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Trust Fund.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The Company shall be responsible for the payment of all benefits provided under the
	Plan. Before a Change in Control, at its discretion, the Company may establish one (1)&nbsp;or more trusts, with such trustees as the Committee may approve, for the purpose of assisting in the payment of such benefits. Following a Change in Control,
	the Company shall establish one (1)&nbsp;or more trusts, with such trustees as the Committee may approve, for the purpose of assisting in the payment of such benefits, and shall fund such trust with the full amount necessary to pay all benefits that
	are reasonably expected to be payable under the Plan. Although such a trust may be irrevocable, its assets shall be held for payment of all of the Company&#146;s general creditors in the event of insolvency and shall not be located or transferred
	outside of the United States. To the extent any benefits provided under the Plan are paid from any such trust, the Company shall have no further obligation to pay them. If not paid from the trust, such benefits shall remain the obligation of
	Company. No assets of the trust or the Company shall become restricted to provide benefits under the Plan in connection with a change in the Company&#146;s financial health.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	11.04.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Nonassignability.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Neither a Participant nor any other person shall have any right to commute,
	sell, assign, transfer, pledge, anticipate, mortgage or otherwise encumber, transfer, hypothecate or convey in advance of actual receipt the amounts, if any, payable hereunder, or any part thereof, which are, and all rights to which are, expressly
	declared to be unassignable and
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	non-transferable.
</FONT>
	No part of the amounts payable shall, prior to actual payment, be subject to seizure or sequestration for the payment of any debts, judgments, alimony or
	separate maintenance owed by a Participant or any other person, nor be transferable by operation of law in the event
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="73%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="2%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="25%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc., 2004 Executive Death Benefit Plan (Restated January 1, 2017)
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 20&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage192"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	of a Participant&#146;s or any other person&#146;s bankruptcy or insolvency, except that the Committee may recognize a domestic relations order in accordance with procedures that it may establish
	for this purpose.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	11.05.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Not a Contract of Employment.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	This Plan shall not constitute a contract of employment between
	Company and the Participant. Nothing in this Plan shall give a Participant the right to be retained in the service of Company or to interfere with the right of the Company to discipline or discharge a Participant at any time.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	11.06.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Protective Provisions.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	A Participant will cooperate with the Company by furnishing any and all
	information requested by the Company, in order to facilitate the payment of benefits hereunder, and by taking such physical examinations as the Company may deem necessary and taking such other action as may be requested by the Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	11.07.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Governing Law.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The Plan shall be construed and enforced in accordance with applicable federal
	law and, to the extent not preempted by federal law, the laws of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania (without regard to the legislative or judicial conflict of laws rules of any state or other jurisdiction).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	11.08.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Severability.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	If any provision of the Plan shall be held unlawful or otherwise invalid or
	unenforceable in whole or in part, the unlawfulness, invalidity, or unenforceability shall not affect any other provision of the Plan or part thereof, each of which shall remain in full force and effect. In addition, if any provision of the Plan
	shall be found to violate section 409A of the Code or otherwise result in benefits under the Plan being subject to income tax prior to distribution, such provision shall be void and unenforceable, and the Plan shall be administered without regard to
	such provision.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	11.09.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Headings.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Headings are inserted in this Plan for convenience of reference only and are to be
	ignored in the construction of the provisions of the Plan.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	11.10.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Notice.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Any notice required or permitted under the Plan shall be sufficient if in writing and
	hand delivered or sent by registered mail, certified mail, or reputable overnight delivery service. Such notice shall be deemed given as of the date of delivery or, if delivery is made by mail or overnight delivery, as of the date shown on the
	postmark on the receipt for registration or certification or on the records of the overnight delivery company. Mailed notice to the Committee shall be directed to the Company&#146;s address. Mailed notice to a Participant or Beneficiary shall be
	directed to the individual&#146;s last known address in Company&#146;s records.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="73%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="2%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="25%">
</TD>
</TR>

<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc., 2004 Executive Death Benefit Plan (Restated January 1, 2017)
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	11.11.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Successors.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The provisions of this Plan shall bind and inure to the benefit of Company and its
	successors and assigns. The term successors as used herein shall include any corporate or other business entity which shall, whether by merger, consolidation, purchase or otherwise acquire all or substantially all of the business and assets of
	Company, and successors of any such corporation or other business entity.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</B>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<B>
	78
</B>
</TD>
<TD NOWRAP VALIGN="BOTTOM">
<B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4.00EM; TEXT-INDENT:-1.00EM; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<B>
	21.02
</B>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>

	Electronic Transmission of Notices and Elections
</B>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage199"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;PURPOSE
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	1.01
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	History of Plan.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The AMETEK Retirement and Savings Plan (the &#147;Plan&#148;) was originally
	adopted, effective October&nbsp;1, 1984, by AMETEK, Inc. (the &#147;Company&#148;) with the approval of its Board of Directors.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The Plan was
	amended and restated, effective January&nbsp;1, 2012, to reflect amendments adopted since the restatement dated January&nbsp;1, 2002, the merger of the AMETEK 401(k) Plan for Acquired Businesses into the Plan on January&nbsp;1, 2008, and additional
	clarifications and amendments intended to improve administration of the Plan.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The Plan was amended and restated, effective April&nbsp;1, 2014, to
	provide for Roth and
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	after-tax
</FONT>
	contributions, to accept direct rollovers of Roth and
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	after-tax
</FONT>
	contributions, and to adopt additional clarifications and amendments
	intended to improve administration of the Plan.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The Plan is hereby amended and restated, effective January&nbsp;1, 2017, to reflect additional
	clarifications and amendments.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	1.02
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Purpose.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The Plan is intended to qualify as a profit sharing plan with a cash or deferred
	arrangement under sections 401(a) and 401(k) of the Internal Revenue Code (the &#147;Code&#148;). Although the Plan is intended to qualify as a profit sharing plan, employer contributions to the Plan may be made without regard to profits.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	1.03
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Effective Date.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Except as specifically provided:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Plan as amended and restated in this document will apply only to eligible persons who are employees of an Employer Unit on or after January&nbsp;1, 2017; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The rights and benefits of Participants whose employment ended before January&nbsp;1, 2017, will be determined under the applicable instruments in effect when their employment ended, or as otherwise specifically
	provided in those instruments.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;The AMETEK Retirement and Savings Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage200"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;DEFINITIONS AND CONSTRUCTION
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	2.01
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Definitions.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	For the purpose of this Plan, the following terms will have the meanings set forth
	below, unless the context clearly indicates otherwise.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Account
</U>
</B>
<B>
	or
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Accounts
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Account&#148; or &#147;Accounts&#148; for any Participant means any account or accounts established pursuant to Section&nbsp;7.01. As used
	in the Plan, the terms &#147;Account&#148; or &#147;Accounts&#148; will mean any relevant one of the Accounts or all Accounts as the context requires.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Adoption Agreement
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Adoption Agreement&#148; means the agreement by which the Plan is adopted with regard to certain Eligible Employees at a Covered Location of an Employer Unit and
	sets forth certain specifications applicable under the Plan with respect to such Eligible Employees. An Adoption Agreement will be effective as of the Effective Date stated in Paragraph A of the Adoption Agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Affiliate
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Affiliate&#148; means any company not participating in the Plan that is:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	a member of a controlled group of corporations as defined in section 414(b) of the Code (determined under section 1563(a) of the Code without regard to sections 1563(a)(4) and (e)(3)(C) of the Code) with the Company;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	any trade or business under common control (as defined in section 414(c) of the Code) with the Company;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(3)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	any member of an affiliated service group (as defined in section 414(m) of the Code) that includes the Company; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(4)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	any other entity required to be aggregated with the Company pursuant to regulations under section&nbsp;414(o) of the Code.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:14%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Notwithstanding the foregoing, for purposes of Section&nbsp;6.02, the definitions in sections 414(b) and (c)&nbsp;of the Code will be modified by
	substituting the phrase &#147;more than 50 percent&#148; for the phrase &#147;at least 80 percent&#148; each place it appears in section 1563(a)(1) of the Code.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	After-Tax
</FONT>
	Contributions
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</B>
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	&#147;After-Tax
</FONT>
	Contributions&#148; means the contributions made to the Plan by an
	Eligible Employee pursuant to a Participant election under Section&nbsp;4.02.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(e)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	After-Tax
</FONT>
	Contribution Account
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</B>
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	&#147;After-Tax
</FONT>
	Contribution Account&#148; means the record of assets held
	by the Trustee for a Participant or Beneficiary under the Plan that is derived from
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	After-Tax
</FONT>
	Contributions.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(f)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT">
<B>
<U>
	Alternate Payee
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Alternate Payee&#148; means any Spouse, former Spouse, child or
	other dependent of a Participant who is recognized by a Qualified Domestic
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;The AMETEK Retirement and Savings Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage201"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Relations Order as having a right to receive all, or a portion, of the benefits payable under the Plan with respect to a Participant.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(g)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Base Group
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Base Group&#148; means for any calendar year, each Participant described in Section&nbsp;3.02:

</TR>

	&nbsp;

<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	twenty-one
</FONT>

	of Service before the last day of the Plan Year;

	6051(a)(3), and 6052 of the Code, (2)&nbsp;amounts deferred at the election of the Employee that would be included in wages if not deferred pursuant to the rules of section 125(a), 132(f)(4), 402(e)(3), 402(h)(1)(B), 402(k), or 457(b) of the

<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Code, and (3)&nbsp;any amounts deducted from an Employee&#146;s earnings on a
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	pre-tax
</FONT>
	basis for group health care coverage because the Employer does not
	request or collect information regarding the Employee&#146;s other health care coverage as part of the enrollment process for the health plan, to the extent that the sum of these amounts is less than the applicable limitation under
	section&nbsp;401(a)(17) of the Code. Compensation is determined without regard to any rules under section&nbsp;3401(a) that would otherwise limit the remuneration included in wages based on the nature or location of the employment or the services
	performed. Compensation includes only amounts actually paid to the Employee during the period he was a Participant in the Plan during a Plan Year or would have been payable during such period but for the Employee&#146;s election to defer amounts in
	accordance with section 125(a), 132(f)(4), 402(e)(3), 402(h)(1)(B), 402(k), or 457(b) of the Code; provided that Compensation will include regular pay (within the meaning of Treasury Regulation section
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	1.415(c)-2(e)(3)(i))
</FONT>
	that is paid by the later of two and
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	one-half
</FONT>
	months after the Participant terminates employment with an Employer or Affiliate or the end of the
	Plan Year. Compensation does not include the following:

	&nbsp;

</FONT>
	bonuses (and for purposes of

</FONT>

	non-performance
</FONT>
	based bonus payments);

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:14%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	To the extent required by section
	414(u)(12) of the Code and guidance issued thereunder, an individual receiving differential wage payments (within the meaning of section 3401(h)(2) of the Code) from the Employer on or after January&nbsp;1, 2009, will be treated as an employee and
	the differential wage payments will be treated as Compensation.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:14%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The annual Compensation of each Employee taken into account under the Plan will
	not exceed $200,000, as adjusted by the Commissioner of Internal Revenue for increases in the cost of living in accordance with section 401(a)(17)(B) of the Code.
</P>

	&nbsp;The AMETEK Retirement and Savings Plan

<A NAME="eolPage203"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(r)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Contribution Ratio
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Contribution Ratio&#148; means for any calendar year the ratio of the sum of the Participant&#146;s allocated Matching Contributions,
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	After-Tax
</FONT>
	Contributions (including
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Pre-Tax
</FONT>
	or Roth Contributions that are recharacterized as
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	After-Tax
</FONT>
	Contributions in accordance with
	Section&nbsp;6.03(a)), and Retirement Incentive Contributions for that year (not including any
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	make-up
</FONT>
	contributions pursuant to section 414(u)(2) of the Code) to the Participant&#146;s Compensation for that
	year. For this purpose, &#147;compensation&#148; means compensation as defined in section 414(s) of the Code and Treasury Regulation
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	section&nbsp;1.414(s)-1.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(s)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Covered Location
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Covered Location&#148; means a facility, plant, location, or other group of an Employer Unit designated as such in Paragraph C of an Adoption Agreement or Exit
	Agreement, or any successor to such facility, plant, location, or other group of an Employer Unit. An Employee will be considered employed at a Covered Location for which he performs the majority of his services or at the location that is
	responsible for the Employee, as determined by the Plan Administrator.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(t)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Deferral Ratio
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Deferral Ratio&#148; means for any calendar year the ratio of a Participant&#146;s
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Pre-Tax
</FONT>
	Contributions and Roth
	Contributions for that year (not including any
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Catch-Up
</FONT>
	Contributions or
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	make-up
</FONT>
	contributions pursuant to section 414(u)(2) of the Code) to the Participant&#146;s
	Compensation for that year. For this purpose, &#147;compensation&#148; means compensation as defined in section&nbsp;414(s) of the Code and Treasury Regulation
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	section&nbsp;1.414(s)-1.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(u)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Disabled
</U>
</B>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Disabled&#148; means (1)&nbsp;if the Participant participated in a defined benefit pension plan maintained by the Employer or the Affiliate immediately before becoming disabled,
	the meaning of this term under the defined benefit pension plan; or (2)&nbsp;if the Participant does not participate in such a defined benefit pension plan immediately before becoming disabled, a Participant will be considered &#147;Disabled&#148;
	if he is receiving disability benefits from Social Security for a disability that occurs while he is employed by the Employer or an Affiliate.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(v)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Discretionary Contributions
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</B>
	&#147;Discretionary Contributions&#148; means the contributions made to the Plan by an Employer on behalf of a Participant pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.04.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(w)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Discretionary Contribution Account
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</B>
	&#147;Discretionary Contribution Account&#148; means the record of assets held by the Trustee for a Participant or Beneficiary under the Plan that are
	derived from Discretionary Contributions.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(x)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Effective Date
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Effective Date&#148; means January&nbsp;1, 2017.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(y)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Eligible Employee
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</B>
	&#147;Eligible Employee&#148; means an individual who is (1)&nbsp;an Employee, (2)&nbsp;a member of a group that has been designated as included in the definition of
	&#147;Eligible Employee&#148; in Paragraph D of an Adoption Agreement, and (3)&nbsp;not a member of a group that has been designated as &#147;Ineligible Employees&#148; in Paragraph D of an Exit Agreement; provided that Eligible Employee will not
	include the following, unless Paragraph D of the applicable Adoption Agreement expressly provides to the contrary:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">

</TD>

<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;The AMETEK Retirement and Savings Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	a Leased Employee, unless required to be included as an Eligible Employee in order to meet the applicable requirements of section 414(n)(3) of the Code;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	an individual who is classified by the Employer or an Affiliate as a temporary or seasonal employee;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(3)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	a student who is employed by the Employer or an Affiliate while attending school or during his or her breaks from school or any other individual who is classified as an &#147;intern&#148; or temporary employee in
	accordance with the Employer&#146;s or Affiliate&#146;s regular employment practices and policies;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(4)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	an individual who is treated or classified by the Employer as a director, independent contractor or otherwise is not classified by the Employer as a &#147;common law employee&#148; of the Employer, even if he is later
	determined to be a &#147;common law employee&#148; of the Employer by reason of Revenue Ruling
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	87-41
</FONT>
	or any successor thereto. If an individual who is excluded pursuant to this paragraph (4)&nbsp;later becomes
	classified as a common law employee of the Employer or an Affiliate for any reason, that individual will be deemed to be an Eligible Employee as of the later of (i)&nbsp;the date on which he is reclassified as a common law employee or (ii)&nbsp;the
	effective date as of which he is reclassified as a common law employee.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(5)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	an individual whose basic compensation for services on behalf of an Employer or Affiliate is not paid directly by an Employer or Affiliate;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(6)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	an individual employed under a contract or other agreement that provides that the individual is not eligible to participate in the Plan; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(7)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	an individual employed by an Employer who is a
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	non-resident
</FONT>
	alien and received no earned income (within the meaning of section 911(d)(2) of the Code) from the Employer that
	constitutes income from sources within the United States (within the meaning of section 861(a)(3) of the Code).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:14%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	An individual will
	be a member of a group that has been designated as included in the definition of &#147;Eligible Employee&#148; in Paragraph D of an Adoption Agreement as of the date his Employer Unit treats him as a member of such a group if, within 60 days after
	such treatment begins, the Company adopts or amends an Adoption Agreement that designates him as included in the definition of &#147;Eligible Employee&#148; in Paragraph D.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(z)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Employee
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Employee&#148; means any person who is employed by the Employer or an Affiliate as a common law employee.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</B>

</TD>

</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage205"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(cc)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Employer Unit
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Employer Unit&#148; means the Company or any Affiliate or any division or other group of the Company or an Affiliate that adopts this Plan as indicated in Paragraph B
	of an Adoption Agreement or Exit Agreement, or any successor to the Company or any such Affiliate, division, or other group of the Company or an Affiliate.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(dd)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Exit Agreement
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</B>
	&#147;Exit Agreement&#148; means the agreement by which certain Employees at a Covered Location of an Employer Unit cease to participate in the Plan and that sets forth
	certain specifications applicable under the Plan with respect to such Employees. An Exit Agreement will be effective as of the Effective Date stated in Paragraph A of the Exit Agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(ee)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Highly Compensated Employee
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Highly Compensated Employee&#148; means an Employee who:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	during the Plan Year or the preceding Plan Year was a Five Percent Owner (within the meaning of Section 19.02(d)), or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	for the preceding Plan Year had compensation (within the meaning of Section&nbsp;6.02(c)(2)) in excess of $110,000 (or such other amount as may be prescribed from
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	time-to-time
</FONT>
</FONT>
	by the Secretary of the Treasury pursuant to section 414(q)(1)(B)(i) of the Code).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:14%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	This definition is intended to implement the definition of highly compensated employee in section&nbsp;414(q) of the Code, and will be applied in a
	manner that is consistent with that section and with any relevant regulations or other guidance issued thereunder, including any regulations or other guidance adjusting the $110,000 amount.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(ff)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Hour of Service
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Hour of Service&#148; means each of the following, without duplication:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	each hour for which an Employee is paid or entitled to payment for the performance of duties for an Employer or an Affiliate;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	each hour for which an Employee is paid or entitled to payment by an Employer or Affiliate although no duties are performed (irrespective of whether the employment relationship has terminated) due to vacation, holiday,
	illness, layoff, jury duty, military duty, or leave of absence;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(3)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	each hour for which back pay is awarded or agreed to by an Employer or Affiliate, irrespective of mitigation of damages; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(4)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	each hour of military leave, in accordance with Section&nbsp;20.03, or family and medical leave that is required by Federal law to be credited.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(gg)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Insurance Contract
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Insurance Contract&#148; means an insurance policy, including, but not limited to, universal life insurance policies issued by a licensed insurance carrier,
	issued to the Trustee for the benefit of a Participant.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">

<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;The AMETEK Retirement and Savings Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 7&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>

<A NAME="eolPage206"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(hh)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Investment Fund
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Investment Fund&#148; means the one or more investment funds provided pursuant to Section&nbsp;8.01.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Leased Employee
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Leased Employee&#148; means any person who, pursuant to an agreement between the Employer or an Affiliate and any other person (&#147;leasing organization&#148;),
	performed services for the Employer or Affiliate or any related persons determined in accordance with section&nbsp;414(n)(6) of the Code on a substantially full-time basis for a period of at least one year and such services are performed under the
	primary direction of or control by the Employer or Affiliate. In the case of any person who is a Leased Employee before or after a period of Service as an Employee, the entire period during which he performed services as a Leased Employee will be
	counted as service as an Employee for all purposes of the Plan, except that he will not, by reason of that status, become a Participant of the Plan. However, the period during which such individual performed services as a Leased Employee will not be
	counted as service as an Employee if, while a Leased Employee, (1)&nbsp;the individual is covered by a plan maintained by his leasing organization that meets the requirements of section 414(n)(5)(B) of the Code and (3)&nbsp;Leased Employees do not
	constitute more than twenty percent (20%) of the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	non-highly
</FONT>
	compensated workforce of the Employer. A Participant will not be deemed to have terminated employment for purposes of this Plan if he becomes a
	Leased Employee.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(jj)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Loan Fund
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</B>
	&#147;Loan Fund&#148; means the Investment Fund described in Section 8.01(a).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>

	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(kk)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Matching Contributions
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</B>
	&#147;Matching Contributions&#148; means the contributions made to the Plan by an Employer on behalf of a Participant pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.01.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>

	(ll)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Matching Contribution Account
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</B>
	&#147;Matching Contribution Account&#148; means the record of assets held by the Trustee for a Participant or Beneficiary under the Plan that are derived
	from Matching Contributions.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(mm)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Merged Plan Contributions
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</B>
	&#147;Merged Plan Contributions&#148; means the amounts that (1)&nbsp;are subject to a vesting schedule, distribution right, or other special right or feature
	identified in the Adoption Agreement that is not otherwise available under the Plan and (2)&nbsp;are transferred to the Plan on behalf of a Participant from a plan that is merged into the Plan pursuant to Section&nbsp;18.04. Merged Plan
	Contributions will be treated the same as Matching Contributions except as provided in the Adoption Agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</U>
</B>
<B>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</B>
	&#147;Normal Retirement Age&#148; means (1)&nbsp;age 65 for a Participant who is not eligible for Retirement Contributions pursuant to Paragraph E of the applicable
	Adoption Agreement or (2)&nbsp;the later of (i)&nbsp;age 65 or (ii)&nbsp;the fifth (5th) anniversary of the Participant&#146;s commencement of participation in the Plan.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>

	term will mean the Participant&#146;s personal representative or guardian.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">

	.

	next completes an Hour of Service.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<B>

	&#147;Qualified Domestic Relations Order&#148; or &#147;Order&#148; means a domestic relations order (as defined in section 414(p) of the Code) that
	(1)&nbsp;creates or recognizes the existence of an Alternate Payee&#146;s right to, or assigns to an Alternate Payee the right to, receive all or a portion of the benefits payable with respect to a Participant under the Plan and (2)&nbsp;meets the
	requirements of section 206(d)(3) of ERISA and section 414(p) of the Code, as determined by the Plan Administrator.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Participant or Beneficiary under the Plan that is derived from Retirement Incentive Contributions.

<B>
<U>
	Rollover Contributions
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</B>
	&#147;Rollover Contributions&#148; means the elective contributions made to the Plan by a Participant under Section&nbsp;4.05.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="7%">

</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(ddd)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Rollover Contribution Account
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Rollover Contribution Account&#148; means the record of assets held by the Trustee for a Participant or Beneficiary under the Plan that is derived
	from Rollover Contributions. The Rollover Contribution Account includes the subaccounts specified in Section&nbsp;7.02(f).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
