<A NAME="eolPage259"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 15.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;CLAIMS PROCEDURE
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	15.01
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Claim.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Any person or entity claiming a benefit, requesting an interpretation or ruling under the
	Plan (a &#147;Claimant&#148;), or requesting information under the Plan may present the request in writing to the Plan Administrator. The Plan Administrator will respond in writing within ninety (90)&nbsp;days after receipt of the claim, provided
	that the Plan Administrator may extend this period for an additional ninety (90)&nbsp;days by providing written notice of the extension to the Claimant within the original
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	90-day
</FONT>
	period. Such notice will
	indicate the circumstances requiring the extension and the date by which the Plan Administrator expects to make a determination of the claim.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	15.02
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Denial of Claim.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	If the claim or request is denied, the written notice of denial will state:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the reasons for denial, with specific reference to the Plan provisions on which the denial is based;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	a description of any additional material or information required for the Claimant to perfect the claim and an explanation of why the material or information is necessary; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	an explanation of the Plan&#146;s claim review procedure, including a statement of the Claimant&#146;s right to bring a civil action under section 502(a) of ERISA if the claim denial is denied (in whole or in part) on
	appeal.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Whether a document, record or other information is relevant for purposes of this Section&nbsp;15.02 will be determined by the
	Plan Administrator in its sole discretion in accordance with 29 C.F.R.
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	&#167;&nbsp;2560.503-1(m)(8).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	15.03
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Review of Claim.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Any Claimant whose claim or request is denied or who has not received a
	response within the time limits set forth above may request a review by notice given in writing to the Plan Administrator. Such request must be made within sixty (60)&nbsp;days after receipt by the Claimant of the written notice of denial, or, in
	the event Claimant has not received a timely response, within 60 days after the date the Plan Administrator was required to respond to the claim under Section&nbsp;15.01. The claim or request will be reviewed by the Plan Administrator which may, but
	will not be required to, grant the Claimant a hearing. On review, the claimant may have representation, examine documents determined by the Plan Administrator in its sole discretion to be relevant to the Claimant&#146;s claim for benefits, and
	submit documents, records, and comments in writing.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	15.04
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Final Decision.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The decision on review will normally be made within sixty (60)&nbsp;days after
	the Plan Administrator&#146;s receipt of Claimant&#146;s claim or request; provided that, under special circumstances, including for a hearing, the Plan Administrator may extend this period for an additional sixty (60)&nbsp;days by providing written
	notice of the extension to the Claimant
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;The AMETEK Retirement and Savings Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 61&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage260"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	within the original
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	60-day
</FONT>
	period. Such notice will indicate the circumstances requiring the extension and the date by which the Plan Administrator expects
	to make a determination on review. If the Plan Administrator extends the period for making a decision, the tolling rule set forth in 29 C.F.R.
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	&#167;&nbsp;2560.503-1(i)(4)
</FONT>
	will apply to the extent applicable.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	If the claim or request is denied on final review, the notice of denial will state the following:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the reasons for denial, with specific reference to the Plan provisions on which the denial is based;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	a statement concerning the Claimant&#146;s right to receive, upon request and free of charge, reasonable access to and copies of all documents, records and other information relevant to the claim;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	a description of any voluntary appeals procedures offered by the Plan; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	a statement of the Claimant&#146;s right to bring a civil action under section 502(a) of ERISA.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Whether
	a document, record or other information is relevant for purposes of this Section&nbsp;15.04 will be determined by the Plan Administrator in its sole discretion in accordance with 29 C.F.R.
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	&#167;&nbsp;2560.503-1(m)(8).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	15.05
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Litigation.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	An &#147;Applicable Claim&#148; as described below in subsection (c)&nbsp;may not be
	filed in any court:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	until the Claimant has exhausted the claims procedures described in Sections 15.01 through 15.04; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	unless such claim or action is filed in a court with jurisdiction over such claim or action no later than two years after:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	in the case of a claim or action to recover benefits allegedly due to the Claimant under the terms of the Plan or to clarify the Claimant&#146;s rights to future benefits under the terms of the Plan, the earliest of
	(a)&nbsp;the date the first benefit payment was actually made, (b)&nbsp;the date the first benefit payment was allegedly due, or (c)&nbsp;the date the Plan first repudiated its alleged obligation to provide such benefits (regardless of whether such
	repudiation occurred during administrative review pursuant to Sections 15.01 through 15.04);
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	in the case of a claim or action to enforce an alleged right under the Plan (other than a right to benefits, which are subject to subsection (b)(1)), the date the Plan first denied the claimant&#146;s request to
	exercise such right, regardless of whether such denial occurred during administrative review pursuant to Sections 15.01 through 15.04;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;The AMETEK Retirement and Savings Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 62&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage261"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(3)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	in the case of any other claim or action described in subsection (c)(4), the earliest date on which the claimant knew or should have known of the material facts on which such claim or action is based, regardless of
	whether the claimant was aware of the legal theory underlying the claim or action,
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:14%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	provided that if a request for administrative
	review pursuant to Sections 15.01 through 15.04 is pending before the Plan Administrator when the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	two-year
</FONT>
	period described in this subsection (b)&nbsp;expires, the deadline for filing such claim or action in
	a court with proper jurisdiction will be extended to the date that is 60 calendar days after the final denial (including a deemed denial) of the claim on administrative review.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:14%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The period described by this subsection (b)&nbsp;is hereafter referred to as the &#147;Applicable Limitations Period.&#148; The Applicable Limitations
	Period replaces and supersedes any limitations period ending at a later time that otherwise might be deemed applicable under state or federal law in the absence of this Section&nbsp;15.05. Except as provided in the following two sentences, a claim
	or action filed after the expiration of the Applicable Limitations Period will be deemed time-barred. The Plan Administrator will have discretion to extend the Applicable Limitations Period upon a showing of exceptional circumstances that, in the
	opinion of the Plan Administrator, provide good cause for an extension. The exercise of this discretion is committed solely to the Plan Administrator, and is not subject to review. Notwithstanding the foregoing, neither this subsection (b)&nbsp;nor
	the Applicable Limitations Period will apply to a claim governed by section 413 of ERISA.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	For purposes of this Section&nbsp;15.05, an Applicable Claim is:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	a claim or action to recover benefits allegedly due under the provisions of the Plan or by reason of any law;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	a claim or action to clarify rights to future benefits under the terms of the Plan;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(3)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	a claim or action to enforce rights under the Plan; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(4)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	any other claim or action that:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="21%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(A)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	relates to the Plan, and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="21%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(B)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	seeks a remedy, ruling, or judgment of any kind against the Plan, the Plan Administrator, or other fiduciary (within the meaning of section 3(21) of ERISA), or a party in interest (within the meaning of section 3(14) of
	ERISA) with respect to the Plan.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	In the event of any Applicable Claim brought by or on behalf of two or more Claimants, this Section&nbsp;15.05, including the Applicable Limitations Period, will apply separately with respect to each Claimant.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;The AMETEK Retirement and Savings Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;

<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 63&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>

<A NAME="eolPage262"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	15.06
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Class&nbsp;Action Forum Selection.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	To the fullest extent permitted by law, any putative class action lawsuit brought in whole or in part under section 502 of ERISA (or any successor provision) and relating to the Plan, the administration of the Plan,
	management or investment or handling of Plan assets, the Trust, or the performance or
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	non-performance
</FONT>
	of Plan fiduciaries or administrators must be filed in one of the following jurisdictions:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the jurisdiction in which the Plan is principally administered; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the jurisdiction in which the largest number of putative class members resides as determined by the Plan Administrator based on records maintained by the Plan Administrator (or if that jurisdiction cannot be determined,
	the jurisdiction in which the largest number of class members is reasonably believed to reside).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	If any putative class action within the scope of subsection (a)&nbsp;is filed in a jurisdiction other than one of those described in subsection (a), or if any
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	non-class
</FONT>
	action
	filed in such a jurisdiction is subsequently amended or altered to include class action allegations, then the Plan, any Plan affiliates, and all alleged Plan participants must take all steps necessary to have the action removed to, transferred to,
	or
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	re-filed
</FONT>
	in a jurisdiction described in subsection (a). Such steps may include, but are not limited to:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	a joint motion to transfer the action; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	a joint motion to dismiss the action without prejudice to its
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	re-filing
</FONT>
	in a jurisdiction described in subsection (a), with any applicable time limits or statutes of limitations
	applied as if the suit or class action allegation had originally been filed or asserted in a jurisdiction in subsection (a)&nbsp;at the same time that it was filed or asserted in a jurisdiction not described therein.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	This forum selection provision is waived if no party invokes it within 120 days of filing a putative class action or the assertion of class action allegations.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	This Section&nbsp;15.06 does not relieve the Plan or any putative class member of any obligation existing under the Plan or by law to exhaust administrative remedies before initiating litigation or to comply with the
	limitations of actions provision set forth in Section&nbsp;15.05.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;The AMETEK Retirement and Savings Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 64&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage263"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 16.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;MANAGEMENT OF FUNDS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	16.01
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Trust Agreement.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	A Trust Fund currently known as the AMETEK Retirement and Savings Trust (the
	&#147;Trust&#148; or the &#147;Trust Fund&#148;) has been established by the execution of trust agreements with one or more Trustees and is maintained for the purposes of this Plan. Each Employer Unit will make contributions under this Plan to the
	Trust for purposes of providing benefits under the Plan.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	16.02
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Designation of Trustee.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	There will be one or more trustees, either corporate or individual, in
	each case appointed and subject to removal by the Company. In case of death, incapacity, resignation or removal of any Trustee, a successor will be appointed by the Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	16.03
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Exclusive Benefit Rule.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Except as otherwise provided in the Plan, no part of the corpus or
	income of the funds of the Plan will be used for, or diverted to, purposes other than for the exclusive benefit of Participants and other persons entitled to benefits under the Plan before satisfaction of all liabilities with respect to them. No
	person will have any interest in or right to any part of the earnings of the funds of the Plan, or any right in, or to, any part of the assets held under the Plan, except as and to the extent expressly provided in the Plan.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	16.04
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Appointing Investment Managers.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The Board of Directors may, from time to time, appoint one or
	more investment managers (within the meaning of section 3(38) of ERISA) to manage, invest and reinvest the Trust Fund, or such part or parts of the Trust Fund as is specified in such appointment. Any appointment made pursuant to this
	Section&nbsp;16.04 may be revoked or modified by the Board of Directors at any time and a new appointment made.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	16.05
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	No Guarantee.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The Employer, the Plan Administrator, and the Trustee do not guarantee the
	Participants or their Beneficiaries against loss or depreciation or fluctuation of the value of the assets of the Trust Fund.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;The AMETEK Retirement and Savings Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 65&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage264"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 17.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ASSIGNMENTS OR LIENS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	17.01
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	No Alienation.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Except as provided in Section&nbsp;17.03 or permitted by section 401(a)(13)(C) of
	the Code, no right, benefit or interest of any Participant or Beneficiary under the Plan may be made subject in any manner to anticipation, alienation, sale, transfer, assignment, pledge, encumbrance or charge, and any attempt or arrangement on the
	part of any person so to do will be void.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	17.02
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	No Liability for Obligation.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Except as provided in Section&nbsp;17.03 or permitted by section
	401(a)(13)(C) of the Code, no right, benefit, or interest will in any way be subject to or liable for the debts, contracts, commitments, obligations, liabilities or torts of any Participant or Beneficiary under the Plan or subject to attachment,
	execution, garnishment, sequestration, seizure or legal, equitable, or other process for or against such person and any attempt or arrangement on the part of any person so to do will be void.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	17.03
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Qualified Domestic Relations Orders.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Notwithstanding the provisions of Sections 17.01 or 17.02,
	the Plan Administrator will direct the Trustee to honor and comply with the provisions of a domestic relations order which the Plan Administrator determines to constitute a Qualified Domestic Relations Order, as defined in section 414(p) of the
	Code. Nothing contained in this Plan prevents the Trustee, in accordance with the direction of the Plan Administrator, from complying with the provisions of a Qualified Domestic Relations Order (as defined in section 414(p) of the Code). The Plan
	Administrator will establish procedures to determine the status of a judgment, decree or order as a Qualified Domestic Relations Order and to administer Plan distributions in accordance with Qualified Domestic Relations Orders. Notwithstanding
	anything to the contrary in Section&nbsp;14.07, reasonable expenses incurred by the Plan Administrator to determine whether a domestic relations order is a Qualified Domestic Relations Order may be paid from the Accounts of the Participant to whom
	such Order relates. Any payment made by the Plan Administrator pursuant to a Qualified Domestic Relations Order will reduce, by a like amount, the amount otherwise payable under the Plan to the Participant to whom such Order relates or his
	Beneficiary, as the case may be.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	17.04
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Distributions Under Qualified Domestic Relations Orders.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	This Plan specifically permits
	distribution to an Alternate Payee under a Qualified Domestic Relations Order at any time, irrespective of whether the Participant has attained his earliest retirement age (as defined under Code section 414(p)) under the Plan. A distribution to an
	Alternate Payee before the Participant&#146;s attainment of earliest retirement age is available only if: (1)&nbsp;the Qualified Domestic Relations Order specifies distribution at that time or permits an agreement between the Plan and the Alternate
	Payee to authorize an earlier distribution; and (2)&nbsp;if the present value of the Alternate Payee&#146;s benefits under the Plan exceeds $5,000 and the Qualified Domestic Relations Order requires, the Alternate Payee consents to any distribution
	occurring before the Participant&#146;s attainment of earliest retirement age. Nothing in this Section&nbsp;17.04 permits a Participant a right to receive distribution at a time otherwise not permitted under the
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;The AMETEK Retirement and Savings Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 66&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage265"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Plan nor does it permit the Alternate Payee to receive a form of payment not permitted under the Plan.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;The AMETEK Retirement and Savings Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 67&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage266"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 18.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;AMENDMENT, MERGER OR TERMINATION
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	18.01
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Amendment of Plan.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The Board of Directors, at a meeting or by unanimous written consent, may
	amend, terminate or suspend this Plan at any time or from time to time by an instrument in writing duly executed in the name of the Company and delivered to the Committee; provided, however, that:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	No amendment will provide for the use of the assets of this Plan or any part thereof other than for the exclusive benefit of Participants and Beneficiaries;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Committee may amend the Plan, without action or approval by the Board of Directors, to modify the maximum percentage of Compensation that may be deferred by Highly Compensated Employees;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	No amendment will deprive any Participant or Beneficiary of any of the benefits that are vested in him or to which he is entitled under this Plan by reason of the prior Years of Service, death, Disability or termination
	of employment of such Participant;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	If the Internal Revenue Service requires that one or more amendments be adopted to the Plan as a condition of receiving a favorable determination letter, and the representative of the Company with respect to the
	application for the determination letter agrees in writing to the adoption of such amendments, such amendments will, upon the issuance of the requested determination letter, be deemed to have been adopted, automatically and without further action by
	the representative, the Company, or the Board of Directors, effective as of the date or dates specified in such amendments; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(e)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	This Plan may be amended at any time and from time to time in any respect so as to qualify this Plan pursuant to section 401(a) of the Code and to comply with the provisions of ERISA, regardless of whether any such
	amendment may change, alter or amend the relative benefits under this Plan of any Participant or Beneficiary.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	18.02
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Termination of Plan.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The Company will have the right, in its sole discretion, at any time, to
	suspend or discontinue its contributions under the Plan, and to terminate at any time, in whole or in part, this Plan and the Trust. To the extent practicable, a termination will be effected by resolution of the Board of Directors and written notice
	thereof will be given by an instrument in writing executed by the Company and filed with the Trustee and Committee. The Plan will also be considered terminated as of the date that the Company is dissolved or liquidated or disposes of substantially
	all of its assets without providing for any successor person, firm or corporation to continue the Plan.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Whether a partial termination has occurred
	depends on all the relevant facts and circumstances, as determined by the Commissioner of the Internal Revenue Service. No Participant will have any right to be vested under Section 18.03(a) on account of a partial termination unless and until the
	Commissioner makes such a determination.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;The AMETEK Retirement and Savings Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 68&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage267"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	18.03
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Vesting and Distribution of Assets on Plan Termination or Complete Discontinuance of Contributions.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Vesting.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Upon complete or partial termination of this Plan, or complete discontinuance of
	contributions to this Plan, a Participant who is affected by the complete or partial termination or discontinuance will be vested in the balance of his Accounts, determined as of the date of complete or partial termination or the discontinuance.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Distribution.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Upon complete or partial termination of this Plan, or complete discontinuance of
	contributions to this Plan, the value of each affected Participant&#146;s account will be distributed in accordance with this subsection (b)&nbsp;to the extent consistent with applicable law. Except as otherwise provided by ERISA, there will first
	be set aside amounts due to Participants who have terminated employment and who were not previously paid pursuant to the provisions of Article 12, and the amount to which any such Participant is entitled will be paid to him or his duly designated
	Beneficiary, as the case may be. The proportionate interest of each other Participant in the remaining assets of the Trust Fund will then be determined in accordance with Article 7 except that the value of such proportionate interest will be
	determined as of the date of termination of this Plan. There will be paid to each Participant
<B>
</B>
	or his duly designated Beneficiary, as the case may be, the benefit thus determined pursuant to this Section&nbsp;18.03, plus his proportionate
	share of any earnings thereon, or less his proportionate share of any losses thereon, if applicable. Provision for the payment of benefits pursuant to this Section&nbsp;18.03 may be made at the direction of the Company, by continuing the Trust Fund
	in existence and making provision therefrom for benefit distributions in accordance with the terms of this Plan, by immediate and full distribution from the Trust Fund of Participants&#146; Accounts, or by any combination thereof. Notwithstanding
	the foregoing provisions of this Section&nbsp;18.03, following the termination of the Plan, a distribution of a Participant&#146;s
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Pre-Tax
</FONT>
	Contribution Account, Roth Contribution Account, or
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Catch-Up
</FONT>
	Contribution Account will not occur if the Employer establishes or maintains a successor plan (as defined under section 401(k) of the Code and the corresponding Treasury regulations).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	18.04
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Merger or Consolidation.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Pursuant to action of the Board of Directors:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the Plan may be merged or consolidated with, or a portion of its assets and liabilities may be transferred to, another plan meeting the requirements of section 401(a) of the Code or any successor provision of law, or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	a portion of the assets and liabilities of another such plan may be transferred to the Plan,
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	provided
	such merger, consolidation or transfer is accompanied by a transfer of such existing records and information as may be necessary to properly allocate such assets among Participants and to provide any tax or other necessary information to the persons
	administering the Plan or receiving the assets, and further provided that each Participant or Beneficiary will be entitled to receive a benefit immediately after such merger,
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;The AMETEK Retirement and Savings Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 69&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage268"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	consolidation or transfer (if this Plan or such other plan were then terminated) which is at least equal to the benefit the Participant or Beneficiary would have been entitled to receive
	immediately before such merger, consolidation or transfer (if this Plan or such other plan had been terminated).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">

</TD>

<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;The AMETEK Retirement and Savings Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 70&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage269"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	19.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;TOP-HEAVY
</FONT>
	PROVISIONS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	19.01
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Priority Over Other Plan Provisions.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	For any Plan Year for which this Plan is a
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Top-Heavy
</FONT>
	Plan, as defined below, the provisions of this Article 19 will apply and control over any contrary provisions of the Plan.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	19.02
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Definitions Used in this Article.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	For purposes of this Article 19, the following definitions
	will apply unless the context clearly indicates otherwise:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Determination Date
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</B>
	&#147;Determination Date&#148; means the last day of the preceding Plan Year.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Employer
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</B>
	&#147;Employer&#148; means any Employer and any Affiliate, each as defined in Article 2.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Employer Plan
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</B>
	Employer Plan means a stock bonus, pension, or profit-sharing plan intended to qualify under section 401(a) of the Code, whether or not terminated, of the Employer.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Five Percent Owner
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</B>
	Five Percent Owner means:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	if the Employer is a corporation, any person who owns (or is considered as owning within the meaning of section 318) more than five percent of the outstanding stock of the corporation or stock possessing more than five
	percent of the total combined voting power of all stock of the corporation; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	if the employer is not a corporation, any person who owns more than five percent of the capital or profits interest in the Employer.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:14%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	For purposes of this subsection (d), no Employer will not be treated as a single employer, and a person&#146;s ownership interest in each Employer will
	not be aggregated.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(e)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Key Employee
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Key Employee&#148; means any employee who at any time during the Plan Year ending with the Determination Date is:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	an Officer whose Total Compensation exceeds the dollar amount under section 416(i)(1)(A)(i) of the Code;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	a Five Percent Owner;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(3)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	a One Percent Owner whose Total Compensation exceeds $150,000; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(4)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the Beneficiary of any individual described in the foregoing clauses of this subsection&nbsp;(e).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;The AMETEK Retirement and Savings Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 71&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage270"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(f)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Non-Key
</FONT>
	Employee
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</B>
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	&#147;Non-Key
</FONT>
	Employee&#148; means, for any Plan Year, an individual who was employed as
	an Employee at any time during the Plan Year and who is not a Key Employee. A
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	&#147;Non-Key
</FONT>
	Employee&#148; also includes and Employee who is a former Key Employee.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(g)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Officer
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Officer&#148; means an individual who is an &#147;officer&#148; within the meaning of section 416(i)(1) of the Code and any regulations prescribed thereunder. No more than
	50 employees of the Employer (or, if lesser, the greater of 3 or 10&nbsp;percent of the employees) will be treated as officers in any given Plan Year. If the number of employees who could be treated as Officers exceeds the limits set forth in this
	subsection (g), then the employees having the highest annual Total Compensation among all potential Officers, during the Plan Year ending with the Determination Date and the four preceding Plan Years, will be considered Officers.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(h)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	One Percent Owner
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</B>
	&#147;One Percent Owner&#148; has the same meaning as Five Percent Owner except that One Percent is substituted for Five Percent wherever that term appears in
	subsection (c).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Permissive Aggregation Group
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</B>
	&#147;Permissive Aggregation Group&#148; means a group of Employer Plans comprising each Employer Plan that is included in the Required Aggregation Group and
	each other Employer Plan selected by the Company for inclusion in the Permissive Aggregation group that would not, by its inclusion, prevent the group of Employer Plans included in the Permissive Aggregation Group from continuing to meet the
	nondiscrimination requirements of section 401(a)(4) of the Code and the participation requirements of section&nbsp;410 of the Code.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(j)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Required Aggregation Group
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</B>
	&#147;Required Aggregation Group&#148; means one or more Employer Pans including each Employer Plan in which a Key Employee is a participant and each other
	Employer Plan that enables any Employer Plan in which a Key Employee participants to meet the nondiscrimination requirements of section 410(a)(4) of the Code or the participation requirements of section 410 of the Code.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(k)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Top-Heavy
</FONT>
	Plan
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;The Plan will be considered a
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	&#147;Top-Heavy
</FONT>
	Plan&#148; for any Plan Year, if, as of the
	Determination Date:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the Plan is not part of a Permissive Aggregation Group or a Required Aggregation Group and the aggregate present value of the Accounts of Participants who are Key Employees exceeds sixty percent (60%) of the aggregate
	present value of the Accounts under the Plan for all Participants; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the Plan is part of a Required Aggregation Group and the sum of the present values of accrued benefits for Key Employees under all Employer Plans included in such Required Aggregation Group exceeds sixty percent (60%)
	of the sum of the present value of accrued benefits of all participants of all plans within the Required Aggregation Group.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;The AMETEK Retirement and Savings Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 72&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage271"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:14%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The Plan will not be considered a
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Top-Heavy
</FONT>
	Plan for any Plan Year
	in which the Plan is part of a Required Aggregation Group or Permissive Aggregation Group which is not
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	top-heavy.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:14%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The present value of accounts and of accrued benefits will be calculated in accordance with section 416(g) of the Code and will include (A)&nbsp;the
	distributions made with respect to the employee under the Plan and any plan aggregated with the Plan during the applicable period ending on the Determination Date; (B)&nbsp;any distributions made with respect to the employee during the applicable
	period ending on the Determination Date under a terminated plan which, had it not been terminated, would have been aggregated with the Plan in a Required Aggregation Group. For purposes of (A)&nbsp;and (B), the &#147;applicable period&#148; will
	mean the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	one-year
</FONT>
	period ending on the Determination Date unless the distribution is an
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	in-service
</FONT>
	distribution or otherwise made for reasons other than severance from
	employment, death, or disability.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:14%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The accrued benefits and accounts of any individual who has not performed services for the Employer during the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	1-year
</FONT>
	period ending on the determination date will not be taken into account for purposes of this subsection (k).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(l)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
<U>
	Total Compensation
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Total Compensation&#148; means &#147;compensation&#148; as defined in Section&nbsp;6.02(c)(2).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	19.03
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Minimum Allocation.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	For each Plan Year during which the Plan is a Top Heavy Plan, for each
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Non-Key
</FONT>
	Employee who has satisfied the eligibility requirements of Section&nbsp;3.01 and who has not separated from service as of the last day of the Plan Year,
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the Employer contributions the Employer otherwise would have made under the Plan for such Plan Year (determined without regard to compensation in excess of Total Compensation), or, if greater,
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	contributions for such Plan Year that, when added to the contributions made by the Employer for such
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Non-Key
</FONT>
	Employee (and any forfeitures allocated to the accounts of such
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Non-Key
</FONT>
	Employee) for such Plan Year under all other defined contribution plans of the Employer,
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	will equal not less than the lesser of:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	three percent (3%) of Total Compensation; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the highest percentage of Total Compensation at which Employer contributions plus forfeitures are allocated (or required to be allocated) for the Plan Year to the accounts of any Key Employee; provided that the
	provisions of this paragraph (d)&nbsp;will not apply if the Plan is in the Required Aggregation Group and enables a defined benefit plan in the Required Aggregation Group to meet the requirements of section 401(a)(4) or section 410 of the Code. For
	purposes of this paragraph (d), all defined contribution plans in the Required Aggregation Group will be treated as one plan.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">

<A NAME="eolPage272"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	For purposes of this Section&nbsp;19.03,
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the minimum contribution allocated to
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Non-Key
</FONT>
	Employees for the Plan Year will be determined without regard to elective deferrals;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
