<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the highest percentage of Total Compensation contributed by the Employer on behalf of any Key Employee under paragraph (d)&nbsp;for the Plan Year will be determined by including elective deferrals; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(3)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	employer matching contributions will be taken into account.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Notwithstanding anything to the contrary in
	this Section&nbsp;19.03, a minimum allocation will not be made on behalf of a
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Non-Key
</FONT>
	Employee under this Plan in the event the Participant is covered by another plan of an Employer and the minimum allocation
	or benefit requirement as set forth in section 416 of the Code and regulations thereunder is satisfied by such other plan of the Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	19.04
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Coordination with Defined Benefit Plan.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	If a
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Non-Key
</FONT>
	Employee who is entitled to receive a contribution under Section&nbsp;19.03 is also entitled to receive a minimum benefit pursuant to section 416 of the Code under a defined benefit pension plan maintained by an Employer, and the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Non-Key
</FONT>
	Employee does not accrue a benefit under such defined benefit pension plan that, together with the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Non-Key
</FONT>
	Employee&#146;s minimum contribution provided under
	Section&nbsp;19.03 hereof, satisfies the requirements of section 416 of the Code, the amount of Matching Contributions allocated to the Matching Contribution Account of such
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Non-Key
</FONT>
	Employee will equal the
	lesser of:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	5&nbsp;percent (5%) of the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Non-Key
</FONT>
	Employee&#146;s Total Compensation for the Plan Year; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the percentage necessary in order that the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Non-Key
</FONT>
	Employee receive the minimum combined benefits under this Plan and such defined benefit pension plan to which he is entitled
	under section 416 of the Code.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">

<A NAME="eolPage273"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 20.&nbsp;&nbsp;SPECIAL RULES FOR MILITARY SERVICE
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	20.01
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	In General.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Notwithstanding any other provision of the Plan, contributions, benefits, and
	service credit with respect to qualified military service will be provided in accordance with section 414(u) of the Code (excluding section 414(u)(9) of the Code). The Plan Administrator may reasonably request that an Employee demonstrate that he
	has engaged in qualified military service within the meaning of section 414(u) of the Code.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	20.02
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Reemployment Following a Period of Qualified Military Service.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<U>
	Reemployment Following a Period of Qualified Military Service
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding any provision of this Plan to the contrary all contributions with respect to periods of qualified military service will be
	provided in a manner consistent section 414(u) of the Code (excluding section 414(u)(9)) if a Participant is treated as reemployed by the Employer under chapter 43 of title 38, United States Code, following a period of qualified military service, as
	follows:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<U>
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Pre-Tax,
</FONT>
	Roth, and
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Catch-up
</FONT>
	Contributions
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;A Participant who is treated as reemployed under chapter 43 of title 38,
	United States Code, following a period of qualified military service will be permitted to contribute additional
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Pre-Tax,
</FONT>
	Roth,
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	After-Tax,
</FONT>
	and
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Catch-up
</FONT>
	Contributions under the Plan in an amount up to the maximum amount of
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Pre-Tax,
</FONT>
	Roth,
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	After-Tax,
</FONT>
	and
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Catch-up
</FONT>
	Contributions that the Participant would have been permitted to make under the Plan during the period of qualified military service if the Participant had continued to be employed during such period and
	received Compensation equal to the Compensation the Participant would have received during such period if the Participant were not in qualified military service, or if such rate is not reasonably certain, the Participant&#146;s average rate of
	Compensation during the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	12-month
</FONT>
	period immediately preceding the qualified military service (or, if shorter, the period of the Participant&#146;s employment as an Employee immediately preceding such period.
	The maximum amount of
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Pre-Tax,
</FONT>
	Roth,
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	After-Tax,
</FONT>
	and
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Catch-Up
</FONT>
	Contributions so determined will be reduced by the amount of any
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Pre-Tax,
</FONT>
	Roth,
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	After-Tax,
</FONT>
	or
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Catch-Up
</FONT>
	Contributions actually made by the Participant during his period of absence due to qualified
	military service. The additional
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Pre-Tax,
</FONT>
	Roth,
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	After-Tax,
</FONT>
	or
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Catch-Up
</FONT>
	Contributions must be made within five (5)&nbsp;years (or,
	if less, three (3)&nbsp;times the length of the Participant&#146;s most recent period of qualified military service) after his reemployment and while the Participant is an Employee.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<U>
	Matching Contributions and Retirement Incentive Contributions
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The applicable Employer Unit will contribute Matching Contributions and any Retirement Incentive Contributions that would have been
	attributable to
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Pre-Tax
</FONT>
	Contributions or Roth Contributions made pursuant to paragraph (1)&nbsp;if the Participant had elected to make such contributions during the period of qualified military service.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;The AMETEK Retirement and Savings Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 75&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage274"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(3)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<U>
	Retirement Contributions
</U>
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The applicable Employer Unit will contribute to the Plan, on behalf of each Participant who is treated as reemployed under chapter 43 of title 38, United States Code,
	following a period of qualified military service, an amount equal to the Retirement Contributions, if any, that would have been required under Section&nbsp;5.02 had such Participant continued to be employed and received Compensation during the
	period of qualified military service.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Contributions made pursuant to subsection (a):
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	will not be taken into account for purposes of the limit described in Section 6.01(a) and the otherwise applicable limitations under Section&nbsp;6.02 for the taxable year or limitation year in which the contributions
	are made; rather such contributions will be taken into account for purposes of such limitations for the year to which the contributions relate; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	will not be taken into account for purposes of the limitations described in Section&nbsp;6.03 for any year.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	20.03
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Service Credit.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	If Section 20.02(a) applies to a Participant, the Participant&#146;s period of
	absence due to qualified military service will be included in the determination of his Hours of Service and the Participant will not incur a Separation of Service Date by reason of his qualified military service.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	20.04
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Loan Repayments.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	As provided in Section 11.05(g)(3), loan repayments will be suspended under
	this Plan as permitted under section 414(u)(4) of the Code.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	20.05
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Survivor Benefits.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	In accordance with section 401(a)(37) of the Code, the survivors of a
	Participant who dies while performing qualified military service (within the meaning of section 414(u) of the Code) will be eligible for any additional benefits (other than additional benefit accruals related to the period of qualified military
	service) that would have been provided under the Plan if the Participant had resumed employment and immediately thereafter terminated employment due to death.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	20.06
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Treatment of Differential Wage Payments.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	To the extent required by section 414(u)(12) and
	guidance issued thereunder, an individual receiving differential wage payments (within the meaning of section 3401(h)(2) of the Code) from the Employer will be treated as an employee and the differential wage payments will be treated as
	compensation.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	20.07
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Termination of Employment.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	For purposes of Article 12, a termination of employment will be
	deemed to occur to the extent permitted by section 414(u)(12)(B) of the Code (concerning individuals performing
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;The AMETEK Retirement and Savings Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 76&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage275"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	service in the uniformed services described in Code section 3401(h)(2)(A)), provided that if a Participant elects a distribution of all or part of his
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Pre-Tax
</FONT>
	Contribution Account, Roth Contribution Account,
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	After-Tax
</FONT>
	Contribution Account, or
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Catch-Up
</FONT>
	Contribution Account
	pursuant to section 414(u)(12)(B) of the Code, the Participant will be prohibited from making
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Pre-Tax
</FONT>
	Contributions, Roth Contributions,
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	After-Tax
</FONT>
	Contributions, or
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Catch-Up
</FONT>
	Contributions under this Plan during the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	six-month
</FONT>
	period beginning on the date of the distribution to the extent required by Code section 414(u)(12)(B)(ii).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">

<A NAME="eolPage276"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 21.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;MISCELLANEOUS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	21.01
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Not a Contract of Employment.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	This Plan will not constitute a contract of employment between
	Company and the Participant. Nothing in this Plan will give a Participant the right to be retained in the service of Company or to interfere with the right of the Company to discipline or discharge a Participant at any time.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	21.02
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Electronic Transmission of Notices and Elections.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Any notice required to be distributed to or
	any elections or directions permitted under Article 4 or Article 8 by Participants, Beneficiaries and Alternate Payees pursuant to the terms of the Plan may, at the direction of the Plan Administrator, be transmitted electronically or telephonically
	to the extent permitted by, and in accordance with any procedures set forth in, applicable law and regulations.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	21.03
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Governing Law.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The Plan will be construed and enforced in accordance with applicable federal law
	and, to the extent not preempted by federal law, the laws of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania (without regard to the legislative or judicial conflict of laws rules of any state or other jurisdiction).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	21.04
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Severability.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	If any provision of this Plan is held unenforceable, the remainder of the Plan
	will continue in full force and effect without regard to such unenforceable provision and will be applied as though the unenforceable provision were not contained in the Plan.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	21.05
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Headings.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	Headings are inserted in this Plan for convenience of reference only and are to be
	ignored in the construction of the provisions of the Plan.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
	*&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;*&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;*
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	IN WITNESS WHEREOF, and as evidence of the adoption of this amended and restated Plan by the Company, AMETEK, Inc. has executed the same this 22nd day
	of December, 2016.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM">
	Headings
</TD>

	&nbsp;&nbsp;

	&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage280"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;PURPOSE
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	1.01
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Purpose.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The AMETEK, Inc. Supplemental Executive Retirement Plan (the &#147;Plan&#148;) provides
	additional retirement benefits, on a
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	tax-qualified
</FONT>
	basis, to a select group of management or highly compensated employees of AMETEK, Inc. whose benefits under certain of the retirement plans maintained for
	employees of AMETEK or its subsidiaries are restricted by the provisions of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	1.02
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Effective Date.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	The Plan, as hereby amended and restated, is effective with respect to amounts
	that were not deferred or vested (within the meaning of section 409A of the Code) before January&nbsp;1, 2005, and any earnings on such amounts. Amounts deferred and vested (within the meaning of section 409A of the Code) before January&nbsp;1, 2005
	and earnings on such amounts are not affected by this amendment and restatement of the Plan, and remain subject to the terms of the May&nbsp;1, 1997 plan document, as amended, which are set forth in Appendix A to this January&nbsp;1, 2017, amendment
	and restatement. For recordkeeping purposes, the Company will establish separate accounts for each Participant for amounts deferred and vested before January&nbsp;1, 2005, and amounts deferred and vested on or after that date.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc. Supplemental Executive Retirement Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 1&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage281"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;DEFINITIONS AND CONSTRUCTION
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	2.01
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Definitions.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	For the purpose of this Plan, the following terms shall have the meanings set forth
	below, unless the context clearly indicates otherwise.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(a)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Account
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Account&#148; means a hypothetical account established on the books of the Company pursuant to Section&nbsp;4.01.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(b)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Beneficiary
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Beneficiary&#148; means the person, persons, or entity as designated by the Participant, entitled under Article 6 to receive any Plan benefit payable after the
	Participant&#146;s death.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(c)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Board
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Board&#148; means the Board of Directors of AMETEK, Inc.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(d)
</B>
<B>
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Change in Control
</U>
</B>
<U>
	.
</U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;A &#147;Change in Control&#148; shall occur if:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Any one Person or more than one Person acting as a group (as defined in section
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	1.409A-3(i)(5)(v)(B)
</FONT>
	of the Treasury Regulations) acquires ownership of stock of the Company that,
	together with the stock held by such Person or group of Persons, constitutes more than 50&nbsp;percent of the total fair market value or total voting power of the stock of the Company. However, if such Person or group of Persons is considered to own
	more than 50&nbsp;percent of the total fair market value or total voting power of the stock of the Company before this transfer of the Company&#146;s stock, the acquisition of additional stock by the same Person or group of Persons shall not be
	considered to cause a Change in Control of the Company; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Any one Person or more than one Person acting as a group (as defined in section
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	1.409A-3(i)(5)(v)(B)
</FONT>
	of the Treasury Regulations) acquires (or has acquired during the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	12-month
</FONT>
	period ending on the date of the most recent acquisition by such Person or group of Persons) ownership of stock of the Company possessing 30&nbsp;percent or more of the total voting power of the stock of
	the Company. However, if such Person or group of Persons is considered to own 30&nbsp;percent or more of the total voting power of the stock of the Company before this acquisition, the acquisition of additional control or stock of the Company by the
	same Person or group of Persons shall not cause a Change in Control of the Company; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(3)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	A majority of members of the Company&#146;s Board is replaced during any
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	12-month
</FONT>
	period by directors whose appointment or election is not endorsed by a majority of the members of
	the Company&#146;s Board before the date of the appointment or election; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(4)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT">
	Any one Person or more than one Person acting as a group (as defined in section
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	1.409A-3(i)(5)(v)(B)
</FONT>
	of the Treasury Regulations) acquires (or has acquired during the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	12-month
</FONT>
	period ending on the date of the most recent acquisition by such Person
	or group of Persons) assets from the Company that have a total gross fair market value equal to substantially all but in no event less than 40&nbsp;percent of the total fair market value of all
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc. Supplemental Executive Retirement Plan
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000">
	Page 2&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage282"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="21%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT">
	assets of the Company immediately prior to such acquisition or acquisitions. For this purpose, gross fair market value means the value of the assets of the Company, or the value of the assets
	being disposed of, determined without regard to any liabilities associated with such assets. A transfer of assets by the Company will not result in a Change in Control under this Section 2.01(d)(4), if the assets are transferred to:
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="21%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(A)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	A shareholder of the Company (immediately before the asset transfer) in exchange for or with respect to its stock;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="21%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(B)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	An entity, 50&nbsp;percent or more of the total value or voting power of which is owned, directly or indirectly, by the Company immediately after the transfer of assets;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="21%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(C)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	A Person or more than one Person acting as a group (as defined in section
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	1.409A-3(i)(5)(v)(B)
</FONT>
	of the Treasury Regulations) that owns, directly or indirectly, 50&nbsp;percent or
	more of the total value or voting power of all the outstanding stock of the Company; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="21%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(D)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	An entity, at least 50&nbsp;percent of the total value or voting power of which is owned directly or indirectly, by a person described in Section 2.01(d)(4)(C), above.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:14%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	For purposes of this Section 2.01(d), no acquisition, either directly or indirectly, by the Participant, his affiliates and associates, the Company,
	any subsidiary of the Company, any employee benefit plan of the Company or of any subsidiary of the Company, or any person or entity organized, appointed or established by the Company for or pursuant to the terms of any such employee benefit plan
	shall constitute a Change in Control.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:14%; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
	For purposes of this Section 2.01(d), the following terms shall have the meanings set forth below:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	&#147;Company&#148; shall mean AMETEK, Inc., except that, if a Participant is employed by a majority-controlled subsidiary of the Company, for purposes of Sections 2.01(d)(1), 2.01(d)(2), and 2.01(d)(4),
	&#147;Company&#148; shall mean such subsidiary.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="14%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	&#147;Person&#148; shall mean any individual or individuals other than the Participant, his affiliates and associates, the Company, any subsidiary of the Company, any employee benefit plan of the Company or of any
	subsidiary of the Company, or any person or entity organized, appointed or established by the Company for or pursuant to the terms of any such employee benefit plan.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(e)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Code
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Code&#148; means the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(f)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Committee
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Committee&#148; means the committee appointed by the Board (or its delegee) to administer the Plan pursuant to Article 7.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:8PT" ALIGN="CENTER">

	&nbsp;&nbsp;AMETEK, Inc. Supplemental Executive Retirement Plan

	&nbsp;&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage283"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(g)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Company
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Company&#148; means AMETEK, Inc., a Delaware corporation, and each of its subsidiaries designated by the Board, which has elected to cover its Employees hereunder by
	resolution of its board of directors.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(h)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Compensation
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Compensation&#148; means (1)&nbsp;if the Participant is accruing a benefit under a defined benefit retirement plan sponsored by the Company, compensation as
	defined in the Employees&#146; Retirement Plan of AMETEK, Inc., or (2)&nbsp;if the Participant is not accruing a benefit under a defined benefit retirement plan sponsored by the Company, compensation as defined in the AMETEK, Inc. Retirement and
	Savings Plan (or any successor plan); provided that in either case, compensation shall not include any special payments commencing on or after July&nbsp;1, 2015.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	(i)
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
<U>
	Compensation Limit
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Compensation Limit&#148; means the amount of Compensation that may be taken into account under a Retirement Plan by reason of the provisions of Section
	401(a)(17) of the Code.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</B>

<U>
	Effective Date
</U>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Effective Date&#148; means January&nbsp;1, 2017.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</U>

</B>

	Plan pursuant to Section&nbsp;3.01.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

</U>
</B>

</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</U>
</B>
<B>
	.

	&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Participant&#148; means any Eligible Employee who satisfies the requirements set forth in Article 3. In the event of the death or incompetency of a Participant,
	the term shall mean the Participant&#146;s personal representative or guardian.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">

<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	(a)

</B>
	the use of the masculine gender shall also include within its meaning the feminine and vice versa,
</TD>

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	the use of the singular shall also include within its meaning the plural and vice versa, and
</TD>

	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
